loans.name: Miguela

texts.en: Miguela is married and has 6 children. She is 54 years old and lives in Yahong, Tudela. Miguela manages a gardening business for a living and she has been in business for 11 years. Each month, she earns 4,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP in order to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In 2011, Miguela joined GDMPC. In the future, Miguela wants to make improvements to her house and to improve her family’s general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Isabina

texts.en:
Isabina is 49 years old and lives in Trigos, Ozamiz City. She is married with five children. She is engaged in farming and she's been doing this for almost 20 years. She earns approximately 3,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) per month. She has requested a loan of 2,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer for her farm.

Isabina has been a member for PMPC for almost five years. She hopes that in the future our cooperative can improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard, 26, lives in Litein County in Kenya. He is a single man and has been in farming for five years producing milk and tea, which he sells to the people around his locality. He buys and sells processed tea leaves as an additional source of income.

He is requesting a loan of 60000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase materials for constructing a greenhouse to help him have better produce, thus increasing his income and raising his standard of living. He aspires to build a dairy unit for his dairy cows, which will help him easily manage his cows.

Animal diseases are his major challenge in farming.

Richard is very greatful to Juhudi Kilimo for giving him the loan.

loans.use: to purchase materials for constructing a greenhouse.

loans.name: Maty's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été crée le 13 décembre 2008. Il est composé de femmes habitant la même commune et se fréquentent les mêmes marchés hebdomadaires et sont très solidaires entre elles. 

Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, la vedette Maty est âgée de 63 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 05 filles et 05 garçons. 

Son prêt reçu, elle va acheter une dizaine de sacs de mil, d'arachide et de maïs qu'elle va revendre dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle va acheter aussi 04 moutons et 03 chèvres les élever avant de revendre. 

Avec les bénéfices générés, elle va améliorer le quotidien de la famille, payer ses intérêts et renforcer ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 13, 2008.  It consists of women who live in the same locality and who go to the same weekly markets.  They are very supportive of each other.

Maty, the featured borrower, is standing on the right-hand side in the photo and raising her hand.  She is 63 years old, married, and the mother of five girls and five boys.

Having received her loan, she will buy ten bags of millet, groundnut and maize and will resell her goods at the weekly markets.  She will also buy and raise four sheep and three goats for resale.

With the profits generated thanks to her activity, she will improve the day-to-day living conditions of her family, pay off her interest and strengthen her savings.

loans.use: to buy millet, groundnut and maize, and also to raise livestock.

loans.name: Good People Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Good People” group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Kenema, a city in Eastern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve on their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Jebbie. Jebbie is 32 years old. She was born in the city of Kenema where she currently resides with her husband and two children. Her husband is a driver, and her children are attending primary and secondary schools. For many years now, Jebbie has been selling cassavas.  With this loan, she will buy a large quantity of cassavas to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of cassavas to add to her current stock

loans.name: Bilal

texts.en:
Bilal is a 25-year-old married male from Madaba in Jordan. He has one child.

He requested a 1,000 JOD loan to pay for food products to resell in his grocery store. In the future he wants to expand his project and buy a home.

Since Bilal is under 30 years old, his loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for food products to resell

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia, 50, is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as a hard-working and social woman. She operates a dairy farm where she sells milk. Her business is located within a productive agricultural area and her primary customers are local residents. 

She will use the 5,800 Kenyan Shilling (KES) loan to purchase a solar lantern which will be used by her family in order to reduce the cost of paraffin used by her five family members. 

Her business goal is to improve her business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will install other rooms in her house with solar lamps.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: German Oswaldo

texts.es: Oswaldo tiene 33 años estado civil casado tiene 2 hijos. El cuenta que el era albañil pero la crisis económica del país como esta dice que se quedo sin empleo por eso el tenia plata ahorra y  después se puso una tienda de víveres en su casa pues eso es lo que ahora es su sustento de vida para El y su familia. Su esposo le ayuda con el negocio pues se levantan las 6:00am a dejar a sus hijos a la escuela y luego  a las 7:00am abre su negocio. El anhela que su negocio crezca más y poderlo surtir con mas productos. Pues con el préstamo el comprara mas víveres como .arroz, azúcar y mejorar su vivienda etc.
texts.en:
Oswaldo is married and has two children.  He says he was a bricklayer but with the economic crisis in his country he ended up without a job.

He had money saved so he set up a general store in his house, which is what supports him and his family now.  His spouse helps him with the business.  They get up at 6 a.m. to leave their children at school and at 7 he opens his business.  He wants for his business to grow and to be able to stock up on more products.

With the loan he'll buy more provisions such as rice and sugar, he'll improve his home, etc.

loans.use: to buy provisions such as rice and sugar, and to improve his home

loans.name: Liza Jane

texts.en:
Liza Jane  is married with 2 children. Liza Jane  is 42 years old and lives in Silucap, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.
Liza Jane owned a general store to earn a living and had this business for 14 years. Each month, she earns 10,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 15,000 to purchase more stock for her general store .
Liza Jane  has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Liza Jane  hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Beth Dev

texts.en: Beth Dev is a married and a mother of 5 dependents. She is 45 years old and lives in Buracan, Bonifacio. Beth Dev owns and operates a motorcycle transport business. She established the motorcycle transport business as a way of generating extra income of 15,600 per month. She has been engaged in this type of service for 8 years. Beth Dev requested a loan of 25,000 from GDMPC. She intends to use the money from the loan to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories. Beth Dev been a good member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Beth Dev wants to purchase more motorcycles to use in her business.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
This is Belen, 42, resident of Manila, Philippines. She is a mother to her child. She manages her household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.  

Belen operates a buy and sell business. What she basically does is buy general merchandise from wholesalers, sell them with a little profit. Her products are men and women’s clothes and other products of the like. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices and the many options she offered. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 300 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php50,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy RTW products and merchandise items to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Belen hopes to be able to expand her business and dreams to give a beautiful future to her child. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stocks of merchandise needed in her business.

loans.name: April Rose

texts.en:
April Rose is from Kapalaran, Tambulig. She is 19 years old and married. 

To make a living, April Rose is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home used products in the local community. April Rose has been in her business for 2 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month for these activities.

April Rose is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offering. In 2011, April Rose joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering.

loans.name: Nila

texts.en:
Nila is 60 years old and lives in Pan-ay,Clarin.Nila is married with 7 children. 
Nila has a general store that sells variety of products.Nila has had this business for 2 years.Nila requested a loan 
to redeem their ricefield.
Nila has been a member of PMPC for 7 years.  In the future,Nila hopes to supplement their family's income.

loans.use: to redeem their ricefield

loans.name: Adelfa

texts.en: Adelfa is 58 years old and is from Poblacion, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. Adelfa is working as chief a baker to help the family to earn for a living. She has been in this business for 5 years and earns 10,000 per month. In 2010, Adelfa joined GDMPC. She requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 to purchase additional cooking ingredients. Adelfa hope to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking ingredients

loans.name: Diosdada

texts.en:
Diosdada is married with 46 children. Diosdada is 46 years old and lives in Lawagan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.
Diosdada grows pigs to sell to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. She has requested a loan to purchase piglets and feeds.
Diosdada has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Diosdada hopes to add more pigs to grow.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feeds

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 52 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 children. 
Teresita is engaged in rice dealing and retailing business and earns approximately PHP5,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional sacks of rice for retailing and dealing business. 
Tereista has been a member of PMPC for 11 years. In the future, Teresita hopes to engage in other type of business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing additional sacks of rice

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 35 years old and lives in Canicapan,Clarin. Tessie is married with 2 children. 
Tessie has a store that sells variety of products.Tessie has had this business for 5 years.Tessie requested a loan to purchase additional products such as canned goods,noodles,beverages,detergents,etc.
Tessie has been a member of PMPC for 10 mos.  In the future,Tessie hopes to financially support her immediate family members.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods,noodles,beverages,detergents,etc.

loans.name: Diosabel

texts.en:
Diosabel is married with (number) children. (Name) is (age) years old and lives in the Philippines.
(Name) is a farmer and grows  (type of crop) to earn a living. (He/She) has been doing this for (#) years. (He/She) has requested a loan to (loan use). 
(Name) has been a member of PMPC for (#) years. In the future, (Name) hopes to (future plans).

loans.use: to purchase additional coconut to sell

loans.name: Rufiminda

texts.en:
This is Rufiminda, 34, resident of Manila, Philippines. He is a mother to her children. She manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Rufiminda is a soft drinks dealer. She buys large quantities of soft drinks from soft drinks factory then sells it to different variety stores. Her ability to please people gives her more and loyal customers.  She earns a minimum of 2500 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php12, 000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more stocks of DVD, speaker units and Soft drinks variants to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Rufiminda hopes to expand her business in the coming years. She dreams to give all her children a good and quality education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more stock of soft drinks needed in her business.

loans.name: Binh's Group

texts.en:
Binh was born in 1984. She has two children who are learning at kindergarten and primary school. Her husband is a welder and he gets 3,000,000 VND from his job. Binh sells ice-cream and ice for a living. She gains 2,500,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,500,000 VND per month. 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 5,152,000 VND to sell more ice-cream and ice in the market for raising her family’s income. Her dream is can let her children going to school till higher education.
Other members which are part of Binh's Group include the following:
 Nam is 30 years old. She has two children. She is a teacher. She wants to borrow 7,392,000 VND to raise chickens for selling. 
 Ban is 30 years old. She has three children. She is a teacher. She wants to borrow 7,840,000 VND to raise chickens for selling.
 Toan is 32 years old. She has two children. She raises pigs for a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to raise more chickens for selling.
 Muon is 51 years old. She has four children. She raises chickens for a living. She wants to borrow 6,944,000 VND to raise more chickens.

loans.use: to buy more ice-cream and ice for selling in the market.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en: Avelina is a 52 year old married woman with two children; ages fifteen and thirteen. She hails from Cortes, Bohol.She had been in the hog raising business for three years.She plans to use the loan to purchase additional piglets, feed and pig supplement. In the future, Avelina would like to expand her business to support the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed and pig supplement

loans.name: Marlito

texts.en:
This is Marlito, 56, resident of Bacoor, Cavite City, Philippines. He is a father to his three children. He manages their household while operating the business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Marlito is a soft drinks dealer. He buys large quantities of soft drinks from soft drinks factory then sells it to different variety stores. His ability to please people gives him more and loyal customers. He also has an arcade shop.  He earns a minimum of 2800 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a Php10, 000 loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy more stocks of Soft drink variants to expand his product inventory. He expects a boost in his business income as he expands his business.  

Marlito hopes to expand his business in the coming years. He dreams to give all his children a good and quality education. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more stock of soft drink variants needed in his business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a married woman from Sikatuna,Bohol.She has three children.Maria is a 52 year old. She had been in the hog raising business for three years. She plans to use the loan to buy additional piglets, feed and pig supplement.According to her, The loan will truly help her to grow her hog raising business. In the future, Maria plans to expand her business to support her family and the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed and pig supplement

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 35 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is married with 1 child. 
Angelina is engaged in chair and table making business and earns approximately PHP3,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional woods and accessories for chair and table making business. 
Angelina has been a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Angelina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing additional woods and accessories

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 62 years old and lives in Palilan, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with 2 children. 
Editha is engaged in fish vending business and earns approximately PHP5,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested loan to be used in purchasing additional fishes to sell. 
Editha has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, Editha hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing additional fishes to sell

loans.name: Majedah

texts.en: Majedah is a 43-year-old married female from Al Hashmi in Jordan. She has three children and requested an 800 JOD loan to pay for various products to resell such as clothes, cosmetics and Dead Sea cosmetics productions. In the future, Majedah would like to improve her living conditions and expand her project.

loans.use: to pay for various products to resell

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla is 35 years old, single, and with no dependants. She owns rental houses, which she built five years ago, and earns a monthly income of 30,000 KES from rent.

She has requested a second loan of 70,000 KES to buy building materials for finishing her rental rooms. The profit she earns from this business will aid her in building more rooms to rent.

Priscilla dreams of opening up a children's home to help the needy children in society.

loans.use: to buy building materials for finishing her rental rooms.

loans.name: Hasna'a

texts.en:
Hasna'a is 46 years old.  She is divorced and from Marka in Jordan.  She has three children.

Hasna’a has requested a loan of 900 JOD to pay for cosmetic products and accessories to resell.  In the future, Hasna'a is planning to buy a car and open her own shop.

loans.use: to pay for cosmetic products and accessories to resell

loans.name: Basma

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons, Basma prefers not to have her photograph on the Internet; thus, the above photo is of her daughter.  Basma is a 49-year-old married woman who has four family members from Nao'or, Jordan.  She is requesting a loan of 1,500 JOD to buy woman and children clothes to resell in the same neighborhood to her friends and neighbors she wants to increase her products.  In the future she hopes to expand her project by opening a shop to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell.

loans.name: Wake-Up Group

texts.en:
Said, who is in his early 30s, is married with one child who is still going to school. Said has been selling chips for three years now. He works from 6:00 pm (evening) to 12:00 midnight, daily, and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which he wants to use to open another place for selling chips. His dream is to one day be able to expand his business and to build his own house.

Said will share this loan with his loan group "Wake-Up", which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to open another store for selling chips.

loans.name: Abednego

texts.en: Abednego is a 34 year old married man. He has a child who is  years old. He describes himself as a social and talkative man. He operates a motorcycle  where he provides transportation services. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located along a busy road and his primary customers are local residents and business people. In addition, he is farms, which adds to his business income from products he harvests such as cereals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be frequent police harassment due to lack of a driving license. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy motorcycle spare parts. His business goal is to buy another motorcycle  within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will educate his children. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy spare motorcycle parts

loans.name: Huda

texts.en: Huda is a 42-year-old married woman from Jubeiha in Jordan. She has four children and requested a 500 JOD loan to pay for her home improvement expenses. She is planning to install a kitchen and in the future, Huda is planning to buy a gas stove and an oven.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvement expenses.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de tarwi que es una menestra que se usa mucho en las comidas y es muy nutritivo,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambien tener un local donde vender tarwi.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas y tambien para comprar tarwi.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member continues selling groceries. She sells rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She works from 8:00 am until 10:00 pm. With this business, she has been able to bring her children up properly. She also continues selling tarwi [Andean lupin], which is a dried vegetable that is commonly used in cooking and is also very nutritious.

She has been working with this for six years and she does very well. Her dream is to expand the groceries store business and also to have an establishment in which she can sell tarwi.

She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, cookies and also to buy tarwi. She is very happy with the loan and she promises to pay the installments in time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, cookies and tarwi.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
ANA ROSA tiene 45 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con el conyugue y el hijo en la CIudad de Ventnaas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la Ventanilla 5 de septiembre, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto los plátanos, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

ANA ROSA se dedica a la agricultura, además cría animales cómo pollos, cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, insecticidas, urea y dos cerdos.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras y el animal para criarlo y venderlo. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. El sueño es comprar un terreno para construir una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta arreglar y cuidar la casa..
texts.en:
Ana Rosa is 45 years old and in a common-law marriage.  She has one child and lives with her husband and son in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.
She is a member of the 5th of September communal bank, located in the banana precinct, which is part of the Ventanas canton, where people work in agriculture and livestock.
Ana Rosa works in agriculture. In addition, she raises animals like chickens and pigs. She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, insecticides, urea and two pigs. 
With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy the fertilizers for the sowing and the animal to raise and sell. She will make the purchases in the city of Ventanas. Her dream is to buy a plot of land to construct a house. In her free time, she likes to tidy-up and take care of the house.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, urea and two pigs.

loans.name: Central Dolores Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento CENTRAL DOLORES está  compuesto por nueve integrantes ocho  mujeres y un varón,   la presidenta del  banco es la Sra.  Carmen tiene 39 años, es casada tiene cinco  hijos de las edades de 15, 12, 8, 6 y 4 años,  ella se dedica a la fabricación de moldes de torta desde hace ya varios años, entrega sus productos a distintas pastelerías con quienes tiene contratos,    su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que necesita el dinero para la compra de material para la elaboración de estos moldes ya que esta época tiene mucho pedidos ya que por estas fechas existen muchos matrimonios y distintas fiestas,  la Sra. Carmen va  a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales y así mejorando sus ingresos, La Sra. Carmen es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada a ella ya sus compañeras del grupo ya que en muchos casos son personas que sacan adelante solas a sus familias
texts.en:
The communal bank "Central Dolores" is made up of nine members: eight women and one man.  The president of the bank is Señora Carmen.  She is 39, married, and has five children of the ages 15, 12, 8, 6, and 4.  She has made a living through the manufacturing of cake molds for several years.  She delivers her products to different bakeries with which she has contracts.  

Her reason for requesting the loan is that she needs money to buy the material for making these molds since this time of year she has many requests because during these dates there are many weddings and different festivals.  Señora Carmen is going to use the profits in order to continue buying materials and thus improving her income.  

Señora Carmen is a very hard-working person.  She is happy for the opportunity offered to her because her partners in the group are in many cases people who have gotten their family ahead on their own.

loans.use: to buy material for manufacturing cake molds.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El señor Roberto tiene ya 65 años, es casado con la señora Victoria, la cual tiene 5 hijos con otro señor que la maltrataba y del cual se divorcio. Actualmente viven en la zona Hipódromo - Cochabamba - Bolivia, es una zona tranquila de la ciudad. Cuando la esposa se divorcio don Roberto se hizo cargo de sus hijastros a los cuales les hizo estudiar y les dio alimentación, actualmente sus hijastros ya son mayores de edad y son independientes. La dificultad que presenta la esposa es que se encuentra enferma y no puede hacer mucha fuerza por lo que ella tiene como actividad principal para distraerse la venta de juguetes, a los cuales ella personalmente las viste. El cliente hace 7 años tiene como actividad principal de tiqueador de tarjetas del Sindicato Mixto de autotransporte, trabaja todos los días de la semana de 8:00 am a 18:00 pm. El crédito que solicitan es para la compra de mercadería (juguetes) y así tener un mayor ingreso por la venta de los mismos, según los solicitantes este ingreso le permitirá ahorrar para su vejez y así no tener que pedir a sus hijos.EL ESPOSO NO PUDO SALIR EN LA FOTOGRAFIA EL QUISO QUE SU ESPOSA SALGA EN ELLA, POR EL MOTIVO QUE EL CREDITO ES PARA ELLA.
texts.en: Roberto, 65, is married to Victoria, who has five children with another man who treated her badly and whom she divorced. They currently live in the Hipódromo area of Cochabamba, Bolivia. It's a quiet part of the city. When his wife got divorced, Roberto became responsible for his stepchildren, whom he fed and gave an education. Now his stepchildren are older and independent. The difficulty for his wife is that she is sick, and she can't make much effort, which is why her principal activity to distract herself is selling toys, which she dresses herself. Roberto has been working as a ticket-taker for the Mixed Transport Union. He works every day of the week from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm. The loan they are applying for is for the purchase of merchandise (toys), so that they can have a higher income through the sale of these toys. According to them, this money will allow them to save for their old age and not have to ask their children for help.

loans.use: to buy toys to sell (his wife's business)

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda lives in Malibangcao, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has seven children. Erlinda buys and sells fuel. For eight years, she has continually managed her fuel business, and she earns PHP 8,400 a month from this. Since 2007, Erlinda has been a member of GDMPC. Now, she needs to buy more fuel to sell, so she requested a loan of PHP 15,000 from GDMPC. She is hoping for business progression and expansion.

loans.use: to buy more fuel to sell.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua is married to a farmer and has six children. Efua sells vegetables like pepper, garden eggs etc. at Efutu. She has been selling vegetables for the past 10 years now. Efua uses her income to assist her husband in providing for their family. She will use her loan to purchase more pepper, garden eggs, onions, tomatoes and other variety of vegetables to sell. With the new profit Efua will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, garden eggs, onions, tomatoes  and other variety of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Arminda

texts.es:
Arminda es casada y tiene un hijo que esta en etapa escolar, viven en casa propia ocupando dos habitaciones con paredes de adobe y el piso de tierra, la casa está ubicada en la zona Rió Abajo de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja por más de ocho horas cultivando flores de toda variedad para posteriormente venderlas en los mercados por cantidad y también a la compra y venta de ganado vacuno.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra  de  semillas mejoradas de rosas, tulipanes y otros,  ya que desea aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Arminda es construir su casa para tener más comodidad.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Arminda is married and has one child of school age. They live in their own home of two rooms with adobe walls and a dirt floor. The house is located in the Rió Abajo area of the city of La Paz.

She currently works more than eight hours growing flowers of all types to sell later at markets for wholesale and she also buys and sells cattle vaccines. 

She needs the loan to buy better rose, tulip, and other flower seeds as she hopes to increase her income and improve her quality of life. Arminda's dream is to build a house for more comfort. This is her second time working with IMPRO and her first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy better rose, tulip, and other flower seeds to offer her customers and to improve her income.

loans.name: Julio Manuel

texts.es:
Julio tiene 45 años de edad, el vive al lado de su esposa con la cual tiene 3 maravillosos hijos los cuales tiene 22, 18 y 8 años y por quienes trabaja muy duro para poder darles una vida digna y sobre todo hacerlos personas de bien. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, paprika, entre otros; asimismo podemos encontrar muchos lugares turísticos como la “Laguna de Huacachina”, la cual recibe a muchos turistas en todo el año. Julio es muy trabajador, pero cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho pintar y en ocasiones disfrutar de uno de sus platillos típicos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. 

Día a día Julio trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de cuadros, retratos, entre otros, el trabaja alrededor de 8 joras al día, mayormente puede atender hasta 5 clientes al día ya que el realizar los retratos le toma tiempo; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque realiza su trabajo con mucha creatividad.

Julio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le  han brindado el podrá materiales para realziar sus trabajos como oleos, pinceles nuevos, entre otros, asi el podra tener los implementos necesarios para realizar sus trabajos y poder seguir luchando para hacer realidad su mas grande seuño:" Tener su casa propia".
texts.en:
Julio is 45 years old.  He lives by his wife’s side and they have three wonderful children, ages 22, 18, and 8.  He works very hard to give his family a decent life and above all, bring them up to be good people.  His home is located in Ica, a city known for its warm, welcoming atmosphere, as well as for its agricultural development, particularly in the cultivation of cotton, grapes, asparagus, paprika, and other products.  In addition, there are many tourist areas such as the “Laguna de Huacachina”, which receives many tourists throughout the year.  Julio is hard working but when he has free time available, he enjoys painting and sometimes enjoys one of his country’s typical dishes, the delicious “Arroz con Pollo” (chicken with rice)”.

Julio works daily in his small business selling paintings, portraits, and other items.  He works about eight hours a day.  Mainly, he serves five customers a day because making portraits takes time.  He believes that his business is going well because he is very courteous to his customers and because he is very creative in his work.  

Julio is very grateful to Kiva for the loans because thanks to their help, he will be able to buy materials such as oils, new brushes, and other items.  In this way, he will have the tools he needs to paint his paintings and continue striving to make his great dream a reality: “Having his own home”.

loans.use: to buy materials such as oil and paint brushes.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se encuentra en la selva peruana, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo por sus paisajes bellos y por la generosidad y alegría de sus pobladores. Ronald es un joven muy optimista y sobre todo con muchas ganas de salir adelante por ello con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyarse con los gastos de sus estudios ya que él se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Administración y ya va por el último año.

Día a día Ronal trabaja en una empresa como empleado, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y por las tardes el va a su centro de estudios; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con sus compañeros y sobre todo por sus ganas de salir adelante.

Ronal está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar utensilios de panadería como batidoras, moldes, planchas, entre otros, ya que va iniciar su negocio de panadería, de esta manera el podrá tener los implementos necesarios para su negocio y así poder seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una mejor calidad de vida y apoyar a sus padres”.
texts.en:
Ronald lives in the city of Pucallpa, a city located in the Peruvian jungle, noted for its hot, welcoming climate as well as for its beautiful scenery and for the generosity and joy of its residents.  Ronald is a very optimistic young man who above all wants to get ahead.  He’s in the last year of his business administration studies and he pays for his education with the fruits of his labor.  

Ronald is employed by a firm and works about 9 hours daily; he attends classes in the evening.  He believes he does well in his work because he’s very kind to his coworkers and above all because of his drive to get ahead.

Ronald is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy baking utensils like mixers, molds and griddles, among others because he’s going to open a bakery.  In this way he’ll have the necessary tools for his business and will be able to continue striving every day to make his greatest dream reality: to have better quality of life and to support his parents.

loans.use: to buy bakery supplies and equipment.

loans.name: Cesar Bladimir

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido ya cogedor, asimismo por la alegría de sus pobladores y por su maravilloso don para la preparación de platillos típicos, ya que son muy deliciosos. Cesar es padre de familia, vive al lado de su esposa y de su pequeño de 6 meses de edad, a quien quiere mucho y sobre todo es el mejor regalo que Dios l ha podido dar y se ha convertido en el motor de su vida. Cuando Cesar tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho jugar futbol y en ocasiones le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima “Carapulcra con sopa seca”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado ser militar.

Día a día Cesar trabaja a como vigilante en una empresa de su ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene un motivo para salir adelante y hacer las cosa bien, el cual es su hijo.

Cesar está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como reparación de paredes, colocación de piso, ya que actualmente es de tierra, de esta manera el podrá seguir adelante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, y seguir en busca de lograr su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y poder terne ruan casa propia”.
texts.en:
Cesar is 21 years old and lives in the city of Chincha.  The city is known for its warm climate, the happiness of the inhabitants, and the marvelous preparation of local cuisines, which are very delicious.  Cesar is the head of his household.  He lives with his wife and their six month old child, who he loves very much and who is God's best gift and has become his motivation in life.  When Cesar has free time he likes to play soccer and sometimes eat one of his favorite dishes, which is the rich "Carapulcra con sopa seca" [traditional pork and potato stew with noodles].  Due to a lack of financial resources, he was only able to study until the fifth year of secondary school, but he would have liked to join the military.  

Cesar works every day as a security guard at a business in the city.  He works around ten hours a day and with effort the fruit of his labors can meet his household's needs.  He believes that his work is going well because he is very responsible and he has a motivation to get ahead and do things well.  This motivation is his son.  

Cesar is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to their help, he will be able to make improvements to his home such as repairing walls and installing a floor, since they currently have a dirt floor.  In this way, he can continue improving his family's quality of life and make progress toward achieving his biggest dream: giving his son a good education and being able to own their own home.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Nila Ysabel

texts.es:
Nila es una joven de 21 años de edad, ella vive en la Ciudad de Guadalupe, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor. Nila es una joven muy trabajadora sobre todo porque es madre de un pequeño de 1 años, a quien quiere muchísimo y por quien trabaja muy duro para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo mucho amor y convertirla en u a persona d bien. Día a día Nila trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, ella labora alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atnder hasta 15 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va  bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Nila está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como polos shorts, bivirís, faldas, entre otros, de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para sus clientes, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y poder luchar para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Nila is a young woman of 21 years of age. She lives in the city of Guadalupe, which is characterized by a very hot climate and a friendly atmosphere. Nila is, above all, a very hard-working young woman because she is the mother of a small one-year-old child whom she loves very much. She works very hard to be able to give him a decent life and, above all, a lot of love so he becomes an upstanding person. Day by day, Nila works in her business selling clothes. She works around 10 hours a day and can serve up to 15 customers during the day. She thinks her business is going well because she is very friendly with the customers and, above all, because she really wants to get ahead.

Nila is very grateful to Kiva lenders since thanks to their help she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business, such as polo shirts, shorts, undershirts, skirts, etc. In this way, she will be able to have a greater variety of products for her customers, thereby enabling her to increase her income and fight to make her greatest dream a reality: "To have her own house".

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, shorts, undershirts, skirts, etc.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es un joven de 27 años, vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, ciudad muy alegre y sobre todo generosa por la calidez de sus pobladores, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de arroz, limón, entre otros. Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Juan logro iniciar su negocio de venta de celulares y accesorios y trabaja en el alrededor de 10 horas al día, ya que con el fruto de su trabajo el puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos novedosos y a un buen precio.

Juan esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más equipos celulares, así como accesorios, entre otros, de esta manera el podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así mejorar sus ingresos y poder seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Tener su propio local”.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos, 27, lives in the city of Guadalupe, a very cheerful city above all a generous one due to its residents’ warm-heartedness.  Agriculture develops here especially rice and lemons, among others. 

With much effort and savings Juan managed to start his business selling mobile phones and accessories; he works about 10 hours daily because he’s able to help his parents meet household expenses with the fruits of his labor.  He believes he does well in his business because he’s very kind to customers and above all because he sells up-to-date products at good prices.

Juan is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy more mobile phone equipment as well as accessories, among others, thus having more variety on hand to offer his customers and improve his income to continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to own his own store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy is 24 years old and married. She is from Macupa, Tangub City. She has two grown children who have helped her in taking care of their bananas. They have been raising bananas for five years and earn 3,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) a month. 

In 2011, Juvy joined GDMPC. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and pay for weeding costs. She hopes for a bountiful harvest and to expand her cultivated area.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay for weeding costs

loans.name: Nyerere Group

texts.en:
Abeid, who is in his early 30s, is married and lives with his wife and two children (a boy and a girl) who go to school. He has been running two businesses for four years now. He sells charcoal and used electronics equipment (TVs, DVDs, radios, etc.). He works from 8am to 6pm daily and is able to make a very good profit per month.

He has requested his tenth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy more sacks of charcoal, to purchase used electronics equipment, and to cover household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He wants to use the new loan to buy more sacks of charcoal and repair on the charcoal store buy putting  iron sheets on the roof and a door (he used to cover the charcoal sacks with a canvas sheets). His dream is to one day be able to build a very big, nice house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Nyerere" which totals 11 members who hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal  and to repair on the charcoal store buy putting  iron sheets on the roof and a door.

loans.name: Madoma Group

texts.en:
Hadija, who is in her early 40s, is married with three children, two of whom are in school. The remaining one is still young. She has been selling fabrics (vitenge), sarongs (kanga), and mandazi (doughnuts) for four years now. She works from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. daily, and she is able to make a small monthly profit.  

She requested a second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy more business stock and covered household expenses, and she has paid back her loan successfully. She hopes for a loan, which she wants to use to increase her business stock to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to build a house.

She will share this loan with her loan group, “Madoma", which totals 17 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her business stock.

loans.name: Dovya Group

texts.en:
Mariam, who is in her early 40's, is married and living with her husband and two adult children.  She has been running a genge business, selling coconuts and Irish potatoes, for one year and a half.  She works from 9am to 6pm daily, and she is able to make a fair monthly profit.

Mariam is requesting her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to buy more genge stock and to save for any unforeseen event.  Her dream is to be able to open a fish business one day.

Mariam will share this loan with her loan group "Dovya," which has 18 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more genge stock, such as coconuts and potatoes, and to save for any unforeseen event.

loans.name: Hysni

texts.en:
Hysni a rural villager located in south-central Albania,is a 54-year-old father of two dependent children. He has been selling milk and other dairy products to locals. He started this activity in his thirties and has since then been enjoying it. Not only does it keep him busy, but he also generates an income. Hysni has been the only one to earn an income for the past 20 years, and that makes him proud of himself.

With a lack of money for his business, Hysni is applying for his first loan with VisionFund Albania. He will use this loan to add some more sheep to the herd he currently has. This loan will enable him to generate more income, to better support his family's living situation and set aside some money to pay the university tuition fees for his children.

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace, 39, is a mother of three children, aged 2 and 13. She is married and lives at West Point. Grace stopped her education in the seventh grade. 

She has a table in the market, where she has been selling raw fish for the past ten years. Her husband works in the government sector, and gave her the initial capital to start in the business. Her favorite part of her business is how customers respond to the business. She makes a profit when she sells; with the profit she buys more goods for the business to increase her sales. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more cartons of raw fish for the business. Her future plan is to build house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more cartons of raw fish for the business.

loans.name: Nicole Estrella

texts.es:
Nicole es una joven de 20 años de edad, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, así como también por sus actividades principales como la agricultura en especial el cultivo de Algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros. Nicoles es una joven muy trabajadora, con mucho esfuerzo logro estudiar la carrera de enfermería, pero debido a que no pudo conseguir trabajo, tuvo l idea de tener su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, en el cual trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y pued atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo ya que es muy amable y sobre todo tiene una muy buena sazón para la preparación de sus platillos.

Nicole está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mostradores, mesas, sillas, entre otros para poder brindar una mayor comodidad a sus cliente sy poder exhibir sus productos de manera mas higiénica, así ella mejorara sus ingresos y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un gran restaurante y ser el orgullo de sus padres”.
texts.en: Nicole is a young woman of 20 who lives in the city of Ica, which is known for its warm climate. Its main industry is agriculture, in particular farming cotton, grapes, asparagus and other crops. Nicole is very hardworking, and with a lot of effort she was able to study for a nursing degree, but because she was not able to find work, she started a small business selling food. She works about 10 hours a day and serves around 20 customers. She thinks the business is going well because she is very friendly and above all her meals are very tasty. Nicole is very grateful for Kiva lenders, since thanks to your help she will be able to purchase counters, tables, chairs and other items in order to provide more comfort to her customers and display her products more hygienically. In this way, she will increase her profits and be able to keep fighting to realize her biggest dream: "To have a big restaurant and make her parents proud."

loans.use: to purchase tables, chairs and other items.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
Jose es un joven padre de familia, vive al lado de su esposa y de su pequeño hijo de 1 año de edad, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Mala, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura y en época de verano sus playas hermosas son visitadas por muchos turistas. Jose es un noven muy trabajador y con  muchos deseos de salir adelante,  el trabaja en una granja como operario de incubadoras, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede turnarse ya sea de día o de noche para trabajar, con el fruto de su trabajo y sobre todo con mucho esfuerzo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar y sobre todo sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo a que ama tanto; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es responsable y sobre todo porque está muy motivado por el regalo más grande que Dios le ha podido dar el cual es su hijo.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una moto, lo cual le permitirá movilizarse mejor para ir a su trabajo ya que queda muy lejos y gasta mucho en pasajes sobre todo cuando tiene turno en la noche, de esta manera el podrá tener más ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa construida de material noble y darle una buena educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
José is a young parent. He lives with his wife and their small one-year-old child. Their home is located in Mala, a city known for having a warm and inviting climate. In addition, agriculture is carried on, and in the summertime its beautiful beaches are visited by many tourists. 

José is a very hard-working young man with a great desire to succeed. He works on a farm as an incubator operator. He works around eight hours a day, and may do shift work; either day or night. With the income from his work, and especially with a lot of effort, he is able to cover his household expenses, and above all, raise their small son whom he loves so much. 

He believes his work is going well because he is responsible, and especially because he is very motivated by the greatest gift that God has been able to give him: his son.  

José is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have provided, he will be able to buy a motorcycle which will make it easier for him to go to work, as it is far away and he spends a great deal on bus fares, especially when he works the night shift. 

This way he will be able to have more income and continue striving to be able to make his greatest dream a reality: "To have a house constructed of high quality materials, and provide our son with a good education."

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Shirley Gioberly

texts.es:
Shirley es una joven madre de 20 años, ella trabaja muy duro cada día para poder brindarle una vida digna a su hijo de 1 año de edad, al cual saca adelante sola ya que el padre de su pequeño la abandono y se ha convertido en padre y madre para su pequeño; Shirley vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad cálida y carismática y sobre todo muy alegre gracias a sus pobladores los cuales son personas generosas y con un don maravilloso para la preparación de platillos los cuales les salen de manera muy deliciosa. Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Shirley inicio su negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y trabaja al lado de su pequeño ya que no puede dejarlo solo, ella puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día y lo hace de manera amable.

Shirley está muy agradecida con el apoyo de los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como ropa para niños, zapatos, adornos para el hogar, así como también juguetes, de esta manera podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y así mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo y poder tener un negocio más grande”.
texts.en:
Shirley, 20, is a young mother who works hard every day to provide a proper life for her one-year-old son who she’s raising by herself since the child’s father abandoned them and she became both mother and father for her little one.

Shirley lives in the city of Chincha, a hot, charismatic city that’s very cheerful thanks to its residents who are generous and gifted with the skill of preparing delicious food.   With much effort and savings, Shirley started her own clothes selling business.  She works about 8 hours daily.  She works alongside her little one because she can’t leave him alone.  She can see up to 20 customers per day and she treats them kindly.

Shirley is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given her she will be able to buy merchandise like children’s clothes, shoes, home decoration and toys for her business to have greater variety of products on hand and improve her income this way which will allow her to continue striving every day to make her greatest dream reality: to provide her son with a profession and to have a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy children's clothes, shoes, home decorations and toys, among others.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Anthony.  He is married and has 1 child. She is 12 years old and goes to school. He has 2 additional dependents who live with him because they are going to school and they help him with domestic affairs.  

In 2002, Anthony established his cosmetics, provisions and drinks business. He got his High School Diploma and was looking forward to going to college, but due to a lack of financial support, he had to set up a petty trade through the help of a distant relative. His business was growing gradually when a friend advised him to learn a trade out of the little he saved. He paid his fees towards a technical vocation. With the help of his younger brother, he was able to handle the business and also learn a trade. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,157,000 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Anthony has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan and now requires a new loan in order to purchase Body Spray – 50- pieces @ Le30, Body Cream - 50 pieces @ Le20,000, Ovaltine - 40 pieces @ Le20,000, Mayonnaise - 50 pieces @ Le20,000 Soft Drinks - 10 crates @ Le30,000 and Star Beer - 8 crates @ Le50,000. 

In the future, Anthony plans to open another outlet. The loan will help as it will enable him buy more stock and make profit. Changes in cost of commodities are his main challenge.  It results to decreases on sales.  He wants more financing and he is looking forward to this subsequent loan. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy provisions and cosmetics for his business

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Maximo de 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 20 y 16 años, por los cuales trabaja muchísimo para que sean felices y que tengan una buena calidad de vida,; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, asimismo sus pobladores tienen un don particular, cocinan de manera deliciosa y sobre todo son personas muy carismáticas y amables. Cuando Maximo dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta escuchar las noticias para poder estar enterado de lo pasa en la actualidad; asimismo le encanta disfrutar uno de sus platillos favoritos, el cual es el riquísimo “arroz con pato”.

Con mucho carisma Maximo abre su negocio de venta de abarrotes desde tempranas horas de la mañana, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 35 clientes en el dia, el cree que le va bien en el negocio porque brinda una buena atención al público.

Maximo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que le han brindado su apoyo por segunda vez y gracias a ello podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio en especial arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, entre otros; lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer y así seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una gran tienda y ser un gran microempresario”.
texts.en:
Máximo, 46, lives with his wife and two children aged 20 and 16 who he works hard for so that they will be happy and have good quality of life. When Máximo has any free time available he likes to listen to the news in order to be well-informed about current events and he also likes to enjoy one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “Arroz con Pato” (Duck with Rice).

With much charisma Máximo opens his grocery store very early in the morning and works about 10 hours daily taking care of up to 35 customers daily.  He believes he does well in the business because he provides good service to the public.

Máximo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because this is the second time they’ve provided support for him and thanks to it he will be able to buy more merchandise for his business, especially rice, sugar, oil and milk, among others that will make it possible for him to have more variety of products on hand to offer and continue striving daily to make his greatest dream reality: to have a great store and to become a great micro businessman.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua   lives together with the husband who is a farmer and 4 children at Abura.  Ekua  produce charcoal  for sale at  Abura, which she has done for 5 years now. Ekua  is a single parent and has 4 children  She uses her income  to feed and pay her children’s school fees.  Ekua  will use her loan to purchase fire wood  to  produce the charcoal  to  sell.  With the new profit from her expanded business  Ekua  will produce the charcoal in large quantity.

loans.use: purchase fire wood  to  produce the charcoal  to  sell.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is a farmer who for three years has grown and sold fruit like oranges in Asafora, near Abura. He uses her income to help his wife pay their children’s school fees. 

Nana is applying for a 530 GHS loan through CRAN to hire laborers to help him on the farm. Her ambition is to keep his farm expanding.

loans.use: to hire laborers to help him on the farm.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un joven e 24 años de edad, el vive al lado de sus abuelos a quienes quiere muchísimo y quienes lo ha apoyado desde muy pequeño sobre todo porque le han dado mucho amor. Su vivienda se ubica en la en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido ya cogedor, así como también por la generosidad y alegría de sus pobladores. Gustavo es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, por ello con mucho esfuerzo logro estudiar la carrera de Contabilidad, Gustavo trabaja en una pequeña empresa como asistente contable y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus abuelos con los gastos del hogar, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable. 
Gustavo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales de construcción para un pequeño cuarto de material noble ya que debido al terremoto del 2007 su casa se derrumbo, lo que le permitirá poco a poco reconstruir la vivienda y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un gran negocio y seguir apoyando”.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a young man of 24 years of age, who lives next to his grandparents who he loves very much and who he has supported from early on particularly because they have given him a lot of love. His home is located in the city of Chincha, a city which is characterized by its warm and inviting climate, as well as the generosity and friendliness of its inhabitants. 

Gustavo is a young man who is very keen to get ahead, that is why with a lot of effort he managed to study Accountancy. Gustavo works in a small business as an accounting assistant, and it is through the fruit of his labors he can help his grandparents with the household costs. He works around 8 hours and he believes that he is doing well in his job because he is responsible and above all because he wants to help his grandparents get ahead.

Gustavo is extremely grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as it is thanks to the help that you give that he will be able to buy construction materials for a small room made with good quality material as his house collapsed due to the 2007 earthquake. This will enable him to rebuild his home little by little and continue to strive ahead to make his biggest dream a reality - that of having a large business and continuing to support (his grandparents).

loans.use: to build a room.construccion de un cuart

loans.name: Alfredo Junior

texts.es:
Alfredo tiene 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y sobre todo recibe a muchos turistas en todo el año, ya que en esta ciudad se encuentran las líneas de nazca, las cuales son jeroglifos ubicados en un extenso campo árido, los cuales eran usado por la antigua cultura nazca según algunos estudios como un calendario para saber la época de lluvias. Vive al lado de su esposa y de su pequeño hijo de 5 años de edad a quien ama muchísimo y por quien trabaja ya que el quiere que su hijo sea mejor que el y que sienta orgullo por su padre. Cuando tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho escuchar música sobre todo porque lo relaja mucho y también porque en algunas oportunidades le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual son los riquísimos “pallares con bisteck".
 
Día a día Alfredo trabaja en su negocio de venta de verduras en el mercado de su ciudad, él le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas diarias; el cree que el va bien su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a un buen precio.

Alfredo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como papas, ají, coliflor entre otros, lo que le permitirá tener más productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y poder mejorar sus ingresos, así el seguirá trabajando y luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Darle una buena educación a su hijo tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 23 years old, he lives in the city of Nazca, a city which is characterized by its warm climate, and above all it welcomes a lot of tourists throughout the year. This is because the Nazca lines are found in this city, which are hieroglyphics located in a vast arid expanse which was, according to some studies, used by the former Nazca culture as a calendar to determine the rainy season.

Alfredo lives with his wife and his young son, aged 5, who he loves enormously and for whom he toils as he wants his son to be better than him, and wants him to be proud of his father. When he has a free moment, he really enjoys listening to music, particularly as it relaxes him, and on some occasions he also likes eating one of his favorite dishes which is the delicious “pallares con bisteck" (Lima beans with steak).
 
From day to day, Alfredo works in his business selling vegetables in the market in his city, He dedicates around 10 hours every day to his business and he believes that it is going well because he is very friendly with his customers and especially because he offers quality products at a good price.

Alfredo is very grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as this is the second time that you have given him this significant help. He will be able to buy merchandise for his business such as potatoes, chili peppers and cauliflower among others, which will enable him to have more products to offer to his customers and thereby improve his income. In this manner, Alfredo will continue working and striving every day to make his biggest dream come true, that of giving his son a good education and having his own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (potatoes, chili peppers, cauliflower among others)

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 50 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere mucho y por los cuales ha lucha cada día para brindarles una vida digna y sobre todo llena de amor y esperanza. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Guadalupe, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, especialmente se cultiva el limón, arroz, entre otros. Carmen es una mujer muy trabajadora poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de taller de estructuras metálicas, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 hora diarias y puede atender hasta 5 clientes en el día ya que es un poco laborioso construir las estructuras; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de progresar.

Carmen está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales como fierro, liquido para soldar, pinturas, entre otros; de esta manera tendrá los materiales y herramientas necesaria para realizar su trabajo y poder  mejorar sus ingresos, de esta manera ella seguirá luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una local campestre”.

loans.use: Para la compra de materiales (fierro, liquido para soldar, pinturas, entre otros)

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 43 años, vive en la cálida ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por tener paisajes hermosos y sobre todo sus pobladores son personas amables y alegres. Maritza es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque es madre de 5 hijos a los cuales saca adelante sola ya que el padre de sus hijos la abandono cuando ellos eran muy pequeños y por ella ha luchado y lucha cada día, sobre todo por sus 2 últimos hijos que aun son menores de edad. Maritza trabaja cada día en su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas y comidas, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y tiene muy buena sazón para la preparación de sus platillos.

Maritza está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda ya que podrá comprar materiales como madera, clavos, calaminas, entre otros y realizar la reparación de su techo, ya que cuando llueve su vivienda se inunda por el techo agujereado, así ella mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia y sobre todo podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Ser una gran empresaria”.

loans.use: Para la mejoramiento de vivienda (arreglo de techo)

loans.name: Djanira Guicella

texts.es:
Djanira es una mujer de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su pequeña hija y su tía, a quienes ama y agradece todo por todo el apoyo brindado, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeña; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Djanira no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 2 años Djanira puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella cuenta con un pequeño espacio en su vivienda, así también sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad para realizar sus ventas.
Djanira se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir para niños, polos, pantalones, polos, zapatos, entre otros; de esta manera Djanira tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder asegurar la educación y bienestar de su pequeña.

loans.use: Para comprar prendas de vestir para niños, polos, pantalones, polos, zapatos,etc.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es un hombre de 31 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja y sus 2 pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Juan Carlos no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 2 años Juan Carlos trabaja brindando servicios de transporte como chofer de mototaxi, adicionalmente también trabaja apoyando a su pareja en la venta de artículos para el hogar, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por la variedad de productos y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Juan Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como mezas de centros, floreros, planchadores, esquineros, etc.; de esta manera Juan Carlos tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener su casa propia, y así desea poder lograr su gran sueño de poder brindarles una buena educación a sus pequeños.

loans.use: Para la compra de mercadería, tales como mezas de centros, floreros, planchadores, esquineros, etc.

loans.name: Flor Geraldine

texts.es:
Flor es una joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pequeño hijo de 2 años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Flor puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella cuenta con un pequeño espacio en su vivienda, así también sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad para realizar sus ventas, Flor puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien el empeño que le pone a su trabajo.
Flor se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir y zapatos para damas, caballeros y niños; de esta manera Flor tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio y así ella desea lograr su gran sueño de ver a su pequeño convertido en un hombre de bien y en un buen profesional.

loans.use: Para la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir y zapatos.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 47 años, se encuentra felizmente casado, vive en la ciudad Chincha con su esposa y sus 3 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todo sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta  de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Luis no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Mecánica que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Luis trabaja como vigilante de un condominio en su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor brindando servicios de seguridad, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por el empeño que pone a su labor.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias  a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la construcción de parte de su casa, ya que lamentablemente su vivienda se destruyo en el último terremoto sufrido en su ciudad y él y su familia viven en un pequeño módulo de madera; de esta manera Luis espera tener su hogar en mejores condiciones, brindando mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para logar su gran sueño de poder darles mayores oportunidades y una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.

loans.use: Para relizar la construccion de su vivienda.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 33 años de edad, ella vive en la cálida ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por sus paisajes hermosos y una fauna muy variada. Es madre de 2 hijos los cuales tiene 17 y 15 años de edad, a quienes ama mucho y se sacan canas verdes por las travesuras que realizan pero siempre le dan alegría y sobre todo ánimos para seguir adelante. Maria es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella todos los días trabaja en su pequeño negocio de comidas típicas y una vez a la semana por las mañanas también atiende su negocio de venta de pescado; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque  tiene una muy buena sazón para la preparación de platillos.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un bote para su negocio de venta de pescado ya que el que el que tiene actualmente se encuentra muy viejito, de esta manera ella podrá tener las herramientas necesaria para poder trabajar y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Construir su vivienda de material noble y darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.

loans.use: Para la compra de un bote

loans.name: Jose Concepción

texts.es: Don José es originario de Ticuantepe de familia agricultora, desde hace muchos años también labora como mecánico en un taller otro ingreso mas para poder cubrir con los diferentes gastos que presenta el hogar, su esposa es ama de casa no trabaja debido al alto índice de desempleo en nuestro país tiene 3 hijos que están en la escuela a quienes desea verlos realizados con una carrera profesional por eso el trabaja día y noche para poderles pagar sus estudios.
