Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Adelita trabaja como operaria de mantenimiento y acondicionamiento en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Adelita se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ella desea poder hacer el encofrado del techo de su casa, así pues de esta manea Adelita tendrá su hogar en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras, que brinden mayor bienestar para ella y su familia, de esta manera Adelita seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para mejorar la calidad de vida de su madre y su pequeño hijo, a quien sueña verlo convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Adelita is a 35 year old woman who lives in the city of Pisco with her mother and her small son, who she loves and considers to be her primary reason for living.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who puts all her efforts toward helping her family to get ahead in life. Sadly, Adelita was not able to study at the university level, since she had to start working at a very young age to help her mother.

With a great deal of dedication and effort, Adelita works every day as a maintenance operator and packaging worker in a commercial business, and she begins works very early in the morning.  She works for about 8 hours a day and thinks that she is doing well because of her hard work and the kind temperament that she displays to those around her.

Adelita is very thankful for the lenders at Kiva, since it is thanks to their help that she will be able to make improvements to her house.  She wants to be able to put a new casing on the roof, and in this way Adelita will have a home that is in better condition, adequate, and safe, and that will contribute to the well-being of her and her family.  Adelita will continue to work and strive to improve the quality of her mother and her child's lives, and she hopes someday to see her son become an educated professional.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 46 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente María no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace mas de cinco años, María trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de artículos para el hogar, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por la variedad de productos y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
María se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como ollas, tinas, tapers, cucharas, platos, termos, entre otros artículos; de esta manera María tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is a 46-year-old woman from the city of Pisco. She lives with her two children whom she loves dearly and who are all she lives for. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person with a strong desire to succeed. Unfortunately, María was not able to study for a professional career, as, from a very young age, he had to work to help his parents with the household expenses. In her free time she likes to spend pleasant moments with her family. 

For over five years, María has worked with effort and commitment in her little household goods shop. She begins in the very early hours of the morning and can work for about 8 hours. She believes that she does well because of the variety of goods she offers and the friendly way in which she deals with customers. 

María is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since their help will enable her to buy merchandise, such as pans, tubs, tupperware containers, spoons, plates, vacuum flasks, amongst other things. This will mean that María can improve the condition of her shop and, hopefully, boost her sales. This increased income will prove tremendously useful as she gradually works toward achieving her great dream of completing building work on her house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as pans, tubs, tupperware containers, spoons, plates, vacuum flasks, etc.

loans.name: Yesenia Elena

texts.es:
Yesenia es una joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete en el distrito de Imperial con su madres y su pequeña hija de un año de edad, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeña, ya que es padre y madre para ella; lamentablemente Yesenia no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con su pequeña hija.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Yesenia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de golosinas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Yesenia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un andamio, una vitrina y mayor cantidad de golosinas; de esta manera Yesenia tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado y abastecido, así pues Yesenia espera aumentar sus ventas para poco a poco poder ampliar su negocio y lograr su sueño de tener su minimarket y lograr que su pequeña sea una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Yesenia, 19, lives in the Imperial district of the city of Cañete with her mother and her young daughter, 1.  She's a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic young woman who dedicates all her effort into getting her little girl ahead because she is both father and mother to her.  Unfortunately Yesenia wasn't able to study for a career but she very much would have enjoyed being able to do so.  In her free time she likes to play with her little girl.

On her own initiative and with great effort and dedication, Yesenia works in her small business selling sweets.  Every day she starts working very early.  She can work approximately 10 hours.  She believes it's going well for her because of her dedication and the kind way she treats others.

Yesenia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy shelving, a display case, and a large quantity of sweets.  This way Yesenia's business will be better outfitted and supplied.

Yesenia hopes to increase her sales and, little by little, her business so she can realize her dreams of having a minimarket and of her daughter being a good professional.

loans.use: to buy shelving, a display case, and sweets

loans.name: Rosa Del Pilar

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 27 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que es padre y madre para sus pequeños; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar, Rosa no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de medicina humana, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Rosa trabaja como chofer de su propia mototaxi, ella brinda servicios de transporte, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Rosa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ella desea poder hacer el pintado, tarrajeo, puesta de piso e instalaciones en su casa, de esta manera Rosa espera tener su hogar en mejores condiciones, que aseguren el bienestar y seguridad de su familia, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su sueño de tener su propia servis de motos.
texts.en:
Rosa, 27 years old, lives in the city of Ica with her two small children. She loves them and they are her main reason for living. She is a kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic woman who devotes all her efforts to moving her family forward. She plays the role of father and mother for her children. Sadly, due to the necessity to work, Rosa was not able to go to school for a career in human medicine, but she would have very much liked to do so. In her free time, she likes to listen to music and, sometimes, she cooks the delicious "carapulcra" and "sopa seca," typical dishes of Peru, and shares them with her family.

With much effort and dedication, Rosa works day to day as a driver of her own motortaxi. She provides transportation services everyday. Starting in the early hours of the morning, she goes out to travel the streets in search of passengers. She works approximately eight hours a day and she thinks that her job is going well due to her kind treatment toward others.

Rosa is very grateful to Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help, she will be able to improve her home. She wants to paint, plaster, put in a floor, and complete other installations in her home. This way, Rosa hopes to have a home in better condition, which will ensure the well-being and safety of her family. Rosa will continue working and striving to fulfill her dream of having her own taxi service.

loans.use: to improve her home

loans.name: Matilde Del Carmen

texts.es: Matilde tiene 67 años de edad es viuda tiene 1 hija y es mayor de edad por lo que es independiente. Ella estudio desde joven la carrera de corte y confección. Su papa en ese tiempo le regalo una máquina de coser. En la actualidad ella les cose la ropa a sus vecinos. Con el préstamo Matilde quiere comprar una máquina de coser, telas, hilos etc. Su sueño es tener un taller de costura grande para así  poderle dar trabajo  muchas personas que no lo tengan.
texts.en:
Matilde is 67 years old.  She is a widow and has a grown daughter who is independent.  From a young age, she studied cutting and tailoring, at which time her father gave her a sewing machine as a gift.  She currently sews clothes for her neighbors.  

With the loan, Matilde wants to buy a sewing machine, fabric, thread, etc.  Her dream is to have a large tailoring shop so that she can offer employment to many people who don't have work.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabric, thread, etc.

loans.name: Thy

texts.en:
Thy, age 39 years, is a married mother of five children, three of whom are dependents and still in school. Her family lives in a rural area of the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia.
 
She has been engaged in farming rice and planting vegetables for 14 years while her husband buys bananas to resell to earn extra income for the family. This current occupation earns them approximately 27,000 KHR per day and they manage to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. Low yield resulting from drought is the main challenge for her farming business. 

This is the first loan for Thy with VisionFund. She is seeking a loan of 3,000,000 KHR. With this loan, she is going to buy a horse as means of transportation for selling bananas in the village. She hopes to sell her bananas timely and for a good price to improve her living conditions and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy a horse as means of transportation for selling bananas in the village.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
Isaías es un hombre de 30 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo Isaías pudo estudiar cursos de electrónica y gasfitería, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas ocasiones come un riquísimo Arroz con Mariscos, el cual es su comida favorita.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Isaías trabaja en su pequeño negocio de servicios de electricidad y gasfitería, él trabaja todos los días y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, él cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes. 
Isaías se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una mototaxi, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder seguir atendiendo a sus clientes a domicilio y adicionalmente los fines de semana brindara servicios de transporte, así pues Isaías seguirá trabajando y esforzando se por alcanzar sus metas y lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia ferretería.
texts.en:
Isaías, 30, is a single man living in the city of Pucallpa.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic man who very much wants to improve.  Thanks to his efforts, he was able to study courses in electricity and plumbing.  He likes to play soccer in his free time and occasionally enjoys a delicious “Arroz con Mariscos” (Rice with Seafood), his favorite dish.

On his own initiative and with much effort and dedication, day to day Isaías works in his small electricity and plumbing business.  He works every day and can do so for about 10 hours.  He believes he does well because of his responsibility and the gracious customer service he provides.

He’s grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy a mototaxi that he will be able to use to provide in-home customer service while at the same time use on weekends to provide transportation services and Isaías can continue striving and working to attain his goals and reach his dream of owning a hardware store.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Jackye Karen

texts.es:
Jackye es una mujer de 30 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus dos pequeños, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para sus pequeños; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las acogedoras y calurosas calles de su ciudad y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Sudado de Sardina para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jackye trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su  labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Jackye se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tanto de abarrotes y bebidas, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jackye, 30, lives in the city of Pucallpa with her two little ones who she loves and are her main reason to live.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic woman who focuses all her efforts into moving her family forward since she’s both mother and father to her little ones.  Unfortunately, due to lack of economic resources and the need to work from an early age to help out her parents, she was unable to study Accounting.  In her free time she likes to wander through the warm and welcoming streets of her city and sometimes cooks a delicious “Sudado de Sardina” to share with her family.

With much effort and dedication, Jackye works in her small business selling groceries and beverages.  She starts work every day very early in the morning and can work about 10 hours; she believes she does well because of the good prices and gracious customer service.

Jackye is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to buy merchandise, both groceries and beverages, for the store.  She hopes with them to increase sales and income that will be of great use for her to reach her dream of owning a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy, from Mayor's Village, Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, is a 37-year-old married mother of three school-aged children. For over 12 years Lucy has owned and operated a business providing transport to local community members, earning approximately 10,000 PHP a month.

In 2008, Lucy joined PMPC. She is now requesting a new loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase canned goods, soft drinks, sacks of rice, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

About PMPC: Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her sari-sari business.

location.town: Tudela-Mayor Village Lapasan, Clarin Mis Occ

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 44-year-old businessman, married to Lucy, a businesswoman, and blessed with three children. He has been selling cereals for the past ten years with a monthly income of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his first loan which is an asset loan from KADET LTD after being introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member. David will use the loan to buy a water tank to store water for family use. 

His hopes and dreams are to educate his children up to university level and improve the family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: Donozio

texts.en:
Donozio is a married man, who owns a retail shop that he has run for four years, having earned his start-up capital by maize produce selling. He still supplements his income from the shop by selling produce. Inadequate capital to meet the high demand is affecting the business. He would like to expand his business to the wholesale level and buy a motorcycle for himself, in the future. The motorcycle would ease his movements to different markets to buy produce from farmers. 

Donozio is requesting a loan to buy sugar, soap and cooking oil, to resell in his store.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap and cooking oil, to resell in his store.

loans.name: Salma

texts.id:
Mrs. Salma, is a war survivor and dedicated entrepreneur who lives in the highlands of Aceh, Indonesia. Her father and brother were killed during the Acehnese civil war and the shop of her family was burnt down. The sales of Nazava Water Filters offer a great opportunity for her and her husband to increase their daily income. In just 6 months Salma sold over 300 water filters and provided over 1500 people with access to safe and affordable drinking water. 

Most of Salma’s customers are poor to lower income coffee farmers that earn less than 5 USD per day. Compared to buying water households safe 132 USD per year using Nazava water filters, which enable them to purify rain, well or river water and make it safe to drink. 
To respond to the high demand for Nazava water filters in her district, Salma would like to purchase bigger stock at reduced costs. She has already established a network of 5 sub-resellers that can directly sell the filters to their customers.

 “I currently have the cash for just 25 filters, that’s why I run out of stock easily, which is bad for my business. Transport costs are also relatively high when ordering just a few filters. “
With a 2000 USD loan, Ibu Salma can provide safe drinking water to 1000 people in just 1 month. The loan enables her to purchase around 200 water filters at a discounted price and with reduced transportation costs. This will provide more families with safe drinking water, increase their disposable income as well as the revenue for Salma.

loans.use: to purchase a bigger stock of water filters and increase the access to safe and affordable drinking water in her district.

loans.name: Tejedores De Sueños Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Tejedores de Sueños” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; costuras, venta de productos naturales, venta de empanadas, venta de ropa, almuerzos, venta de chocolates, paquetería, venta de comida rápida, servicios entre otros. Todos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valparaíso.
Gipsy, integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en la última fila, ocupando el primer lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste  una polera de color negro con rosas blancas, su cabello es de color castaño claro y lo  usa tomado.
Ella se dedica al rubro de venta de ropa y accesorios varios, desde hace 3 años. Comenta  que trabaja en su casa ofreciendo varios modelos de ropa y accesorios como carteras, pañuelos a su clientela.
La mercadería que va necesitando la compra en la ciudad de Santiago donde encuentra gran variedad de modelos, y tallas grandes que su clientela le ha ido pidiendo.
Con el crédito comprará chaquetas para hombres, mujeres y niños, de varios modelos y colores.
Una de las metas de Gipsy es instalar una tienda en su propia casa, habilitando algún espacio para atender a su clientela con más tranquilidad y no invadir el espacio familiar.
Gipsy vive junto a su hijo de 7 años de edad y su hermana quien se encuentra estudiando. Sus sueños a nivel personal y laboral es tener su tienda y agregar otros tipos de rubros como la artesanía.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio. Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades e intereses, lo cual le ha servido como un momento de distracción. Respecto a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones, ha aprendido administrar su negocio de mejor manera.
Valparaíso está situado a 120 kilómetros al noroeste de Santiago. Es la capital regional y además sede del poder legislativo del país. Es el primer puerto de la nación y ofrece gran variedad de lugares hermosos y pintorescos, como por ejemplo la casa del poeta Pablo Neruda, ganador del Premio Nobel.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called ‘Tejedores de Sueños’ [Dreamweavers].  It is comprised of 17 entrepreneurs who work in different fields.  Among those fields is sewing, selling natural products, selling empanadas, selling clothes, lunches, selling chocolates, parcel service, selling fast foods, and services, among others.  All of them live in the city of Valparaíso.

Gipsy, a member of the communal bank, appears in the last row of the photo.  She is the first one on the left, and she is wearing a black top with white roses.  Her hair is light brown, and she wears it pulled back.

She has been selling clothes and various accessories for three years.  She says that she works at her house, and she offers her customers various styles of clothing and accessories like wallets and scarves.  She buys the merchandise that she needs in the city of Santiago.  This is where she finds a greater variety of styles and large sizes for the customers who order them.  She will use the loan to buy various styles and colors of jackets for men, women, and children.  

One of Gipsy’s goals is to set up a store at her house by outfitting a space to take care of her clientele more serenely, without encroaching on the family space.  Gipsy lives with her 7 year old son and her sister, who goes to school.  Her dreams on a personal and work level are to have her store and to add other types of products like handicrafts.

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity given to her by Fondo Esperanza.  It has allowed her to invest in her business.  Also, she is very comfortable in the company of the rest of the entrepreneurs in her communal bank.  This is because they share different activities and interests, which has served as a means of recreation for her. The training provided at the meetings has taught her to better manage her business.

Valparaíso is located 120 kilometers northeast of Santiago. It’s the regional capital and also the seat of the country’s legislative branch of government. It’s the nation’s main port, and it has a variety of beautiful, picturesque places, like Nobel Laureate Pablo Neruda’s house, for example.

loans.use: to buy various styles and colors of jackets for men, women, and children.

loans.name: Teodocia Emerita

texts.es:
Teodocia es una mujer de 46 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus cuatro hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que siempre ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus hijos; lamentablemente Teodocia no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar unos deliciosos Chicharrones para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Teodocia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, ella trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien, ya que debido al buen trato que brinda a sus clientes ha conseguido clientes fieles que siempre acuden a ella.
Teodocia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindad podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como madera, clavos, calaminas, entre otros; de esta manera Teodocia podrá terminar la construcción de su vivienda, así pues ella tendrá su hogar en mejores condiciones, más seguros y adecuados para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Teodocia, 46, lives in the city of Pucallpa with her four children, whom she loves and who are her main motivation in life.  She's a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman who always has devoted all her efforts to getting her family ahead because she is both father and mother to her children.  Unfortunately Teodocia was not able to study for a profession because from a very young age she had to work to help her parents.  In her free time she likes to prepare some delicious cracklings to share with her family.

With a lot of effort and dedication, Teodocia works every day in her small business selling groceries and beverages.  She works from very early in the morning and can do it for approximately 12 hours.  She's comfortable doing her job and believes it's going well for her because, with her pleasant treatment of her customers, she has acquired loyal customers who always go to her.

Teodocia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy wood, nails, metal roofing, and other construction supplies.  This way Teodocia will be able to finish construction on her house and her home will be in better condition, safer and more suitable for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Unidos Progresamos Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Unidos Progresamos” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de empanadas, venta de tortillas, costuras, venta de ropa, lencería, venta de cuadros, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valparaíso.
Eileen. Integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en primera fila, ocupando el primer lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste un pantalón de color gris, una polera de color rosada, su cabello es de color castaño, lo usa largo y suelto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de venta de papas fritas y empanadas desde hace 1 año. Comenta que trabaja por los alrededores de su casa junto a una amiga, vende en plazas, ferias ofreciendo sus papas fritas y empanadas de queso y queso camarón.
La mercadería en insumos que va necesitando los compra en supermercados mayoristas, distribuidoras, molino donde encuentra la harina a buen precio, las papas las compra en el mercado a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará una freidora de papas, mostaza, kétchup, aceite.
Una de las metas de Eileen son poder comprar un carrito para poder desplazarse sin ninguna dificultad para ofrecer sus alimentos a su clientela.
Eileen vive junto s u esposo y su hija pequeña de 2 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel laboral es tener un local de comida rápida para generar mayores ingresos y darles una buena estabilidad económica a su familia.
Ella se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación. Por otro lado las capacitaciones, le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias de venta y contabilidad.
Valparaíso está situado a 120 kilómetros al noroeste de Santiago. Es la capital regional y además sede del poder legislativo del país. Es el primer puerto de la nación y ofrece gran variedad de lugares hermosos y pintorescos, como por ejemplo la casa del poeta Pablo Neruda, ganador del Premio Nobel.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Unidos Progresamos" [Together We Progress] and is made up of seventeen entrepreneurs who make a living in different fields such as: selling empanadas, selling tortillas, sewing, clothing sales, lingerie shops, table sales, and different services, among others.  All members are residents of the city of Valparaíso.

Eileen is a member of of this communal bank group.  In the photo she is seated in the first row, occupying the first spot from right to left, in grey pants and a pink shirt.  She has brown hair, and she wears it long and down.

She has made a living in the field of selling fried potatoes and empanadas for the past year.  She says that she works near her home with a friend, selling in plazas and at festivals, offering her fried potatoes, cheese empanadas, and cheese and shrimp empanadas.  

She buys the ingredients she needs from wholesale supermarkets, distributors, and mills where she can find flour at a good price.  She buys the potatoes at the market at a low cost, where it's more economically convenient.

With the loan, she will buy a potato deep-frier, mustard, ketchup, and oil.  One of Eileen's goals is to be able to buy a cart so that she can easily move herself around and be able to offer her goods to her customers.  

Eileen lives together with her husband and her small, two-year-old daughter.  Her work dream is to have a fast food stall to generate higher profits and to give economic stability to her family.  She is very happy and thankful for the opportunity offered through Fondo Esperanza, since they will allow her to invest in her business.  In regards to the communal bank, she says that they have very good communication.  In regards to the training, they have helped her to learn new selling and accounting strategies.  

Valparaíso is situated 120 kilometers northeast of Santiago.  It is the regional capital and headquarters of legislative power of the country.  It is the first port of the nation and offers a great variety of beautiful and picturesque places, like for example, the house of poet Pablo Neruda, winner of the Nobel Prize.

loans.use: to buy a potato deep-frier, mustard, ketchup, and oil.

loans.name: Rosa Narciza

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con su esposo y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos deliciosos Tallarines Rojos para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Rosa trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas y refrescos, adicionalmente también tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede laborar un aproximado de 12 horas, Rosa se siente a gusto con su negocio y cree que le va bien por su buena atención.
Rosa se siente muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de prendas de vestir de la temporada de  verano, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños; de esta manera Rosa podrá abastecer su negocio de venta de ropa, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is 51 years old and lives with her husband and two children in the city of Ica, within the Santiago district.  She loves them very much and they are the reason for her existence.  She is a lovely, hardworking and enthusiastic person who together with her husband puts forth all of her efforts to get her family ahead.  She likes to do some reading in her spare time and sometimes likes to cook a delicious “Tallarines Rojos” to share with her family.

Each day Rosa works her small business, selling drinks and soft drinks, and also clothing.  She begins working early in the morning, works up to 12 hours a day, and is comfortable with the business.  She feels that she is doing well because of the good service she gives.

Rosa is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and is thankful for the help they give.  It will allow her to buy articles of summer clothing for men, women, and children.  In this way Rosa will be able to stock her clothing business in hopes of increasing her income.  This will also help her expand her business.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Evangelina Lorensa

texts.es:
Evangelina es una mujer de 40 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su pareja y sus tres pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Evangelina pudo estudiar una pequeña carrera de repostería, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines Rojos para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Evangelina trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de postres y bebidas, ella trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede laborar por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Evangelina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la construcción del techado de su vivienda, ya que ella cuenta con los materiales necesario y solo falta cubrir los gastos de la mano de obra para realizarlos; de esta manera Evangelina podrá contar con una vivienda en mejores condiciones, más seguras y adecuadas para ella y su familia, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para superarse y lograr sus sueño de tener su propio local de ventas y ver convertidos a sus pequeños en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Evangelina is a forty year old woman.  She lives in Nazca with her partner and three young children. She loves her children very much and they are her main reason for living.  She is friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic and she and her partner dedicate all of their efforts to getting their family ahead.  Thanks to her hard work, Evangelina was able to study for a small pastry career.  In her free time, she enjoys watching educational programs on television and sometimes cooks delicious “Tallarines Rojos” (Peruvian spaghetti in red sauce) to share with her family.  

Day by day, with much determination and dedication, Evangelina works in her small business selling desserts and drinks.  She begins work in the early morning hours and may work for about twelve hours.  She feels at ease doing her work and believes that it is going well because of her flavorful dishes and the kind treatment she provides to her customers.

Evangelina is very grateful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to their support, she will be able to build the roof of her house.  She already has the necessary materials and only needs to cover the labor costs.  In this way, Evangelina will be able to have a home that is in better condition, and that is safer and comfortable for herself and her family.  So, she will continue working and striving to succeed and achieve her dream of having her own sales location and seeing her young children become professionals.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 25 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente José no pudo estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Civil que deseaba, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones su mamá cocina unos riquísimos Chicharrones para engreírlo, ya que este es su comida favorita.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, José traba como obrero de campo, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores de campo, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder hacer los acabados de una habitación, ya que su casa es muy pequeña y desearía poder tener una habitación adecuada donde sus pequeños hermanos puedan vivir con seguridad y mayor bienestar, así pues José seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para junto a su familia salir adelante y lograr sus sueños de ser un buen profesional.
texts.en:
José is a 25 year old man. He lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago, with his parents and siblings. He is a friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who really wants to get ahead. Unfortunately, José wasn't able to study civil engineering like he wanted, since he had to work from the time he was very young to help his parents. He would have liked to do so. In his free time, he likes to play soccer with his friends and on occasion his mother makes delicious chicharrones to spoil him, because this is his favorite food. 

With mush effort and dedication, José works as a laborer. Every day very early he starts in the fields. He can work approximately 8 hours and he thinks that it is going well for him because of his hard work and because of how he treats others kindly.

José is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help, he can do some home improvements. He wants to finish a room, since it is very small and he would like to have a room where his young siblings can live in safety and wellbeing. José will keep working and striving to get ahead with his family and make his dream come true of having a good profession.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Anabel Viviana

texts.es:
Anabel es una mujer de 41 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus cuatro hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amble, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que es padre y madre para sus hijos; lamentablemente Anabel no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus abuelos, quienes la cuidaron desde muy pequeña, ya que sus padres lastimosamente fallecieron; en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus hijos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Escabeche de Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su hermanos, día a día Anabel trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de golosinas, ella cuenta con un pequeña tienda afuera de su casa, en algunas ocasiones realiza sus ventas fuera de los colegios que se encuentran cercanos a su hogar, ella trabaja todos los días un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Anabel se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como golosinas y bebidas, de esta manera Anabel tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder cumplir su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Anabel, 41, lives in the Santiago district of the city of Ica with her four children, whom she loves and who are her main motivation in life.  She's a very pleasant, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman who devotes all her effort to getting her family ahead because she's both father and mother to her children.  Unfortunately Anabel wasn't able to study for a career in education because from a very young age she had to work to support her grandparents, who took care of her after her parents died when she was very young.  In her free time she likes to play with her children, and sometimes she cooks a delicious marinated chicken to share with her family.

With a lot of effort and dedication, and thanks to the support of her siblings, Anabel works every day in her small business selling sweets.  She has a small store outside her house.  Sometimes she makes sales outside the schools located close to her house.  She works approximately eight hours every day and believes it's going well for her because of the pleasant way she treats her customers.

Anabel is grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy merchandise for her business, such as sweets and beverages.  This way Anabel's business will be better stocked and she'll be able to increase her sales and her income, which will serve her well to be able to realize her big dream of seeing her children become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy sweets and beverages

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es:
Feliciano es un hombre de 55 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus cuatro hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente por diversas razones desde hace varios años se separó de su esposa, desde entonces él dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver noticieros y programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia, Feliciano no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Agrónoma, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años Feliciano trabaja como operario de riego en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Feliciano se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder terminar el techado y tarrajeo de su casa, de esta manera él podrá tener su hogar en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras que brinden mayo bienestar para él y su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr sus metas y su gran sueño de terminar la construcción total de su hogar.
texts.en:
Feliciano is a 55 year old man who lives in the city of Ica in the district of Santiago with his four children, who he loves and considers to be his primary reason for living. Sadly, for a variety of reasons, he separated from his wife several years ago, and since that time, he has devoted all his energies toward helping his family to get ahead.  In his free time, he likes to watch the news and educational programming on television, and he sometimes cooks a delicious duck and rice dish to share with his family.  Feliciano was not able to study at the university level in the field of Agricultural Engineering, but he would have really liked to do so. 

With a great deal of dedication and hard work, Feliciano has worked as an irrigation systems operator on a farm in his city for the past several years. Every day he begins work very early in the morning, and he works around 10 hours a day, and he thinks it is going well because of his performance and  the goodwill that he shares with everyone.


Feliciano is very thankful for the lenders at Kiva, since it is thanks to their help that he will be able to make improvements to his house.  He wants to finish the roofing and unfinished parts of the house, and thereby to have a home in better condition, adequate and secure to improve the well-being of his family.  Therefore, he will continue working and making an effort to achieve his goals, and his greatest dream is to finish the final bits of construction on his house.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Yey Luz

texts.es:
Yey es una mujer de 20 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Yey no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a su madre, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las calurosas y acogedoras calles de su ciudad y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Pachamanca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Yey trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella vende desayunos y almuerzos, Yey puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Yey se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de madera y pintura para remodelar su local de ventas, así también comprará dos mesas para acondicionar su negocio, así pues Yey seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio restaurante.
texts.en:
Yey is a 20 year old single woman who lives in the city of Pucallpa with her parents and siblings.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Sadly, Yey was not able to study at the university level in the field of accounting, because she had to begin working at a very early age to help her mother. In her free time, she likes to go walking through the warm and narrow streets of her city, and sometimes she cooks a meal of delicious Pachamanca (a traditional Peruvian festal dish made in an earth oven) to share with her family.

By her own initiative, and with a great deal of effort and dedication, Yey has had a small business where she makes and sells food. Every day, she begins work early in the morning, and she sells breakfasts and lunches.  Yey works for about 8 hours each day, and she thinks it is going well because of her delicious seasonings and the good service that she provides to her customers.

Yey is very thankful for the lenders at Kiva, since it is thanks to their help that she will be able to buy wood and paint to remodel her business location, and at the same time, she plans to buy two tables to further improve her business. In this way, Yey will be able to continue working and struggling to get ahead and achieve her greatest dream, which is to have her own full restaurant.

loans.use: to buy wood and paint.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz es una  mujer de 32 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Mala con sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente Luz sufrió la pérdida de su amado esposo, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, Luz no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Luz trabaja brindando servicios de mantenimiento en un campamento de extranjeros en su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Luz se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de tramitación y formalización del terreno que su esposo le dejo como herencia para la construcción de su hogar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Luz is a 32 year old woman who lives in the city of Cañete in the district of Mala with two small children, who she loves and considers to be her primary reason for living. Sadly, Luz suffered the loss of her beloved husband, and since then she has been working hard to help out her family.  Luz was not able to study at the university in the field of education because she had to start working at a very young age to help her parents. In her free time, she likes to listen to music, and sometimes she cooks a delicious meal of chicken and rice to share with her family.

With a great deal of dedication and effort, Luz works doing maintenance services in a settlement of foreigners in her city.  She works every day for about 12 hours, and she feels content doing her work and thinks it is going well because of her hard work and the good service that she gives to her customers.

Luz is very thankful for the lenders at Kiva, since it is thanks to their help that she will be able to cover the costs of processing and formally transferring the title on the land that her husband left her as an inheritance to build her house on.  In this way, she will be able to continue working and struggling to reach her greatest dream, which is to see her children grow up to be educated professionals and good people.

loans.use: to cover the costs of processing and formally transferring the title on her land.

loans.name: Alicia Raquel

texts.es:
Alicia es una mujer de 20 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Alicia se encuentra estudiando una carrera técnica de Administración, en sus ratos libres le gusta ingresar a internet y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Alicia trabaja como asistente en una pequeña cooperativa de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días un aproximado de 8 horas, Alicia se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Alicia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de su un tratamiento médico y la compra de medicinas que necesita para mejorar su salud, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de ser una buen profesional y tener su negocio propio.
texts.en:
Alicia is a 20 year old single woman who lives in the city of Ica with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who who has a great desire to succeed. Thanks to her hard work and the support of her parents, Alicia is currently studying a course in Business Administration in college.  In her free time, she likes to get on the internet, and sometimes she cooks a delicious Ají de Gallina (spicy chicken stew) to share with her family.

With a great deal of effort and dedication, Alicia works as an assistant in a small cooperative in her city.  She works for about 8 hours daily, and Alicia feels happy with her work and thinks she is doing well because of her hard work and the kind treatment that she shows to others.

Alicia is very thankful for the lenders at Kiva, since it is thanks to their help that she will be able to cover the costs of her medical treatment and buy medicines that she needs in order to become healthy again.  In this way, she will be able to continue working and make an effort to get ahead and achieve her dream of being a professional with her own business.

loans.use: to cover the costs of her medical treatment.

loans.name: Kosal's Group

texts.en:
Kosal is aged 34 years and married. She lives with her family in a rural village located in the Sa Ang district of Kandal province. She has one dependent daughter who is too young for schooling. To make a living, she has been weaving mats for about ten years while her husband is a paid worker. Together, they can earn about KHR10,000 per day and manage to save about KHR5,000 each day for the future needs. The main challenge for her family's business is the lack of working capital to support the business. 

This is the group loan for Kosal's group consisting of four members who live in the same area. Kosal has been a member of VisionFund for one cycle already and completely paid back the loan. The first loan helped her better support her life. To respond to her challenge, she is leading her group to apply for another loan with VisionFund. She wants to use her portion to buy raw materials for her weaving business. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income so as to make a living better.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Mahoude Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOUDE est composé de cinq personnes qui résident toutes dans le même quartier au Bénin. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Mahudé Marie Roberte est celle qui a le doigt levé sur la photo. Mahudé Marie Roberte est âgée de 22 ans et est une célibataire et n’a pas d’enfant. Mahudé Marie Roberte n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Mahudé Marie Roberte vit seule et assure seule ses différentes charges. Depuis près de six ans, Mahudé Marie Roberte vend des mèches et divers autres articles de façon ambulante. Mahudé Marie Roberte s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Mahudé Marie Roberte sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOUDE, un crédit.
texts.en:
The Mahoude Group is made up of five people who all live in the same area in Benin.  This is the first time that the group is asking for financial help through ALIDé, with the goal of taking their businesses to the next level. The representative of the group, named Mahudé Marie Roberte, is the woman in the photo with her finger raised. Mahudé Marie Roberte is 22 years old and is single with no children.  She has never attended school, and she lives alone providing for her own needs. 

For almost six years now, Mahudé Marie Roberte has been selling hair tresses and various other articles as an itinerant saleswoman.  She buys her stock at a market in Benin.  Seeking to better satisfy her customers and raise her income, Mahudé Marie Roberte is asking for a loan along with the other members of the Mahoude Group.

loans.use: to purchase hair tresses and other articles.

loans.name: 08-Ts3-11-Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khang operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase pork and noodles to prepare food to sell. Khang has been involved in this business for five years.

Khang is 55 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents, as her children are grown up.

Khang is the group leader of the 08-TS3-11-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which consists of eight members. This is Khang's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
 
The main hardship that Khang faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Khang hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase pork and noodles to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Jeffa

texts.en:
Jeffa is 29 years old. He is married and he lives in his own house  in the district of Kwale, Coast Province in the town of Tiribe. Jeffa runs a barber shop. He has about 12 years of experience. His shop is located along the busy street that leads to the market, in a place that has been specifically equipped for his activity: he has no immediate competition in the area and the shop is strategically located. 

Thanks to the money he earns from his barber shop, he is able to pay for his family’s expenses.

Jeffa wants to buy supplies, such as shampoo, for his barber shop, and to buy a new shaving machine. For this reason he has asked for a loan of KES30,000, in order to achieve his goal.

loans.use: to buy supplies, such as shampoo, for his barber shop, and to buy a new shaving machine.

loans.name: Julia Mercedes

texts.es:
Julia originaria de León, pero actualmente vive en Estelí, soltera, de oficio comerciante, madre de 4 hijos. Ella cuenta que inicio su negocio con ayuda de sus hermanos y el papa de sus hijos, fue a la edad de 30 años que inicio su negocio de pulpería, este ha sido su  primer negocio y lo administra en su casa.
Julia solicita el préstamo para comprar granos básicos como: arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergente y jabón, pasta de dientes, avenas, pan, cosméticos etc. Ella  estima que este préstamo le será de gran ayuda, para poder surtir con más productos su pulpería, incrementar el volumen de sus ventas a  y asi generarles mas ganancias en su negocio, sus objetivo es ampliar su pulpería para satisfacer las necesidades de sus  clientes.

loans.use: Para comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergente y jabón, pasta de dientes, avenas, pan, cosméticos etc.

loans.name: Franciscana Aurora

texts.es: Francisca tiene 42 años de edad es casada y tiene 3 hijos el  mayor estudia en colegio  y los 2 mejores estudian en un escuela pública cerca de su casa. Comenzó con la ilusión de tener un negocio propio para también generar ingreso a su casa y fue como dio la apertura a  un mini bazar viniendo las necesidades de sus vecinos ya que no habia bazar por su casa. Poco a poco fue incrementando sus ventas por lo que ahora vende, blusa, cuadernos, lápiz. Con es crédito quiere comprar cuadernos, lápices, carpetas etc. Su meta es ampliar su negocio.
texts.en: Francisca, 42, is married and has three children. The oldest is in secondary school and the two youngest study in the public school close to her house. She began with the dream of having her own business to be able to earn money for her household. This is how she came to open a mini-store, selling things that her neighbors needed, since there was no shop near her house. Little by little she increased her sales through what she sells now: blouses, notebooks, pencils. With this loan, she wants to buy notebooks, pencils, folders, etc. Her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, folders, etc.

loans.name: Luz Marivi

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su mamá y hermanas, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia Luz se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Ingeniería de Minas, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines Verdes para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Luz trabaja como secretaria en una empresa minera de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y buen desempeño.
Luz se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos del tratamiento médico que se realizará su madre, ya que lastimosamente padece una penosa enfermedad; de esta manera Luz espera poder mejorar la salud de su madre y aliviar sus dolencias, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para cumplir su gran sueño de ser una buena profesional y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz, 20, lives in the city of Nazca with her mother and sisters who she loves and are her main reason for living.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person with a strong wish for self-improvement.   Thanks to her effort and family support, Luz is studying Mining Engineering.  She likes to relax watching television in her free time and sometimes cooks a delicious “Tallarines Verdes” to share with her family.

With much effort and dedication, Luz works as a secretary in a mining firm in her city.  She starts work every day very early in the morning and works about 8 hours; she believes she does well because of her responsibility and the good ways he does her work.

Luz is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to cover her mother’s medical treatment because sadly she suffers from a grievous illness.  In this way, Luz will be able to improve her mother’s health and ease her pain and she will continue working and striving towards reaching her great dream of being a good professional and to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to pay her mother's medical expenses.

loans.name: Eberth Martin

texts.es:
Eberth es un hombre de 21 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Eberth se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional Electrónica, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo programas cómicos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Eberth trabaja brindando servicios de atención al cliente en un restaurante pollería de su ciudad, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Eberth se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder poner el piso de concreto en una habitación de su hogar; de esta contar con su vivienda en mejores condiciones, seguras y adecuadas para él y su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Eberth, 21, is single living in Nazca with his parents and siblings.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic man with a strong wish for self-improvement.  Thanks to his effort and support from his parents, he’s studying the professional career of Electronics.  In his free time he likes to relax watching comedy television programs and occasionally cooks a delicious “Arroz con Pollo” [Chicken with Rice] to share with his family.

With much effort and dedication, Eberth works providing customer service in chicken restaurant in his city; he works about 8 hours and feels good doing his work and feels that he does well because of the good way he does his work and the kind way he treats others.

Eberth is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to do some home improvements.  He wants to install a concrete floor in one of the bedrooms so that his house will have better living conditions that are save and adequate for him and his family and he can continue working and striving towards reaching his great dream of becoming a good professional.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José es un joven de 19 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres e hijos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres y solventar sus gastos, José no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Gastronomía, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música para relajarse y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Res para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día José trabaja brindando atención al público en un restaurante de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su empeño y por  el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de medicinas que necesita para calmar las dolencias y mejorar la salud de su Madre, ya que hace muy poco tiempo ella sufrió un penoso accidente, así pues José seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y desea poder cumplir si gran sueño de tener su propio restaurante.
texts.en:
José is nineteen years old and unmarried. He lives in the city of Nazca with his parents and siblings. 

He is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Unfortunately, due to the need to work to support his parents and cover expenses, José was not able to study a professional career to become a chef, as he would have liked.

In his free time, he likes to listen to music to relax, and he occasionally cooks a delicious Seco de Res (a Peruvian beef stew) to share with his family.

With plenty of effort and dedication, José works day in and day out serving customers at a restaurant in his city. Starting in the early morning, he works for about 8 hours per day. He feels comfortable in his job, and he believes that it is going well because of his effort and the friendly service he gives customers.

José is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to buy the necessary medications to calm his mother's ailments and improve her health, as she suffered a painful accident very recently. José will continue working and striving to succeed. He hopes to make his greatest dream come true by having his own restaurant.

loans.use: to buy the medications his mother needs.

loans.name: Pedro Jesus

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 29 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Computación e Informática, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones come unos riquísimos Pallares con Seco, el cual es su plato favorito.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Pedro trabaja brindado servicios de seguridad como Serenasgo, él puede trabajar una aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Pedro se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la construcción de una pequeña habitación en la vivienda de sus padres, ya que ellos le dejaron como herencia un pequeño terreno en su hogar, así pues de esta manera Pedro podrá iniciar la construcción de lo que en un futuro no muy lejano será su hogar; Pedro espera poder seguir trabajando y esforzándose a fin de lograr su gran sueño de poder estudiar una carrera profesional y tener su propia familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is 29 years old and unmarried. He lives in the city of Ica. He is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Thanks to his effort, he was able to study a technical degree in computing and informatics. 

In his free time, he likes to play soccer with his friends, and occasionally he eats a delicious dish called Pallares con Seco (a Peruvian dish made with lima beans), his favorite food.

With plenty of effort and dedication, Pedro works day in and day out offering his services as a security guard. He works for about 12 hours per day. He believes that the job is going well, thanks to his responsibility and for the friendly service he offers to others.

Pedro is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to carry out the construction of a small bedroom in his parents' home. They left a small area of their home to him as an inheritance, so Pedro will now be able to begin construction on what in the not-so-distant future will be his home.

Pedro hopes to continue working and striving to make his greatest dream come true: to study a professional degree and have his own family.

loans.use: to carry out improvements to his home.

loans.name: Keeyda Katherine

texts.es:
Keeyda es una mujer de 24 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Keyyda pudo estudiar la carrera de Fisioterapia y Rehabilitación, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Escabeche de Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Keeda trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de zapatos, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella cuenta con un pequeño espacio en su casa donde vende sus productos, asi también realiza sus ventas de manera ambularía, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Keyyda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como zapatos, sandalias, zapatillas, entre otros; de esta manera Keyyda tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda ampliar su negocio y en futuro no muy lejano, desea poder cumplir su sueño de tener su propio puesto de ventas en un centro comercial de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Keeyda is 24 years old and unmarried. She lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago, with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person with a great desire to succeed.

Thanks to her effort and to the support of her parents, Keeyda was able to study physiotherapy and rehabilitation. In her free time, she likes to relax by listening to music, and occasionally she cooks a deliciuos Escabeche de Pollo (a Peruvian dish made with marinated chicken) to share with her family.

With plenty of effort and dedication, Keeyda works in her small business selling shoes for men, women, and children. She works every day, starting in the early morning. She sells her products from a small space in her house, and she also makes sales on a travelling basis. She works for about eight hours per day. She thinks that the work is going well due to her responsibility and the friendly service she offers her customers.

Keeyda is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help she will be able to purchase merchandise for her business, such as shoes, sandals, and slippers, among others. In this way, Keeyda's business will be better stocked, and she hopes to increase her sales and her income. 

This will be very helpful for her so that she can gradually expand her business. In the not-so-distant future, she hopes to make her dream come true by having her own stall to sell her products at a shopping center in her city.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shoes, sandals, and slippers.

loans.name: Faizullo

texts.ru: файзулло  молодой парень 31 года, содержит  семью из троих детей, занимается услугами маршрутного такси. Имеет 10ти летний стаж в вождении.  Он развозит людей по городу и за город.   В нашу организацию обратился 1,5 года назад на ремонт своей арендованной автомашины и получил  кредит. Тогда он был наемным водителем и брал свою автомашину в аренду.  Накопил достаточную сумму денег на покупку собственного автомобиля и осуществил свою мечту.  Получая небольшие кредиты он купил первый микроавтобус.  Этот  микроавтобус немного требует ремонта и Файзулло планирует подготовить его на зимний период.  На полученный кредит хочет купить некоторые запчасти и зимних покрышек.  Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Faizullo is a young man of 31 years, who is supporting a family of three children through offering a "marshrutka" taxi service. He has 10 years of experience in driving. He takes people around and out of the city. He turned to our organization 1.5 years ago for repairing his rented vehicle, and he received a loan. At that time he was a hired driver and was renting his vehicle. 

Faizullo saved up a sufficient amount of money to purchase his own vehicle and realized his dream. Receiving a small loan he bought his first minibus. This minibus is in need of some repair and Faizullo plans to prepare it for the winter period. For the loan he would like to purchase some spare parts and winter tires. He thanks for your support in advance.

loans.use: to purchase winter tires for his minibus

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en la ciudad de Pisco la cual se caracteriza por su clima acogedor y sus hermosos atractivos turísticos, Maria vive al lado de su madre a quien cuida y apoya con el fruto de su trabajo. Maria aprendió desde joven el valor del trabajo ya que su madre no tenia muchos ingresos y tuvo la necesidad de apoyarla, por ello no logro terminar sus estudios. Poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar de venta de abarrotes, desde hace desde 3 años, ella trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 10 horas y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con sus clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos  a precios cómodos y sobre todo de calidad.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como arroz por sacos, azúcar, fideos, conservas, entre otros; de esta manera podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer y mejorara sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para lograr su más grande sueño:”  Tener un minimarket y seguir apoyando a su madre”.
texts.en:
Maria is a very hardworking woman. She lives in the city of Pisco known for its warm climate and beautiful tourist attractions. She lives next to her mother who she cares for and supports with the payoff from her work. Maria learned at a young age about the value of work since her mother did not have much money. She needed to support her, so she was not able to finish her studies. Little by little, with a lot of effort and savings, she started to sell groceries three years ago. She works in her business about ten hours and she can serve up to 15 customers daily. She believes that her business is going very well because she is very friendly with her customers and more than anything, because she offers good quality products at a comfortable price. 

Maria is very grateful for the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help that they offer she will be able to purchase merchandise for her business like bags of rice, sugar, noodles, canned food and other items. With these products, she will have a greater variety of products to offer to customers and she will improve her earnings. This will allow her to continue fighting to achieve her biggest dream of having a minimarket and to continue supporting her mother.

loans.use: purchase merchandise like bags of rice, sugar, noodles, canned food and other items.

loans.name: Cristian Jairo

texts.es:
Cristian tiene 33 años, vive al lado de su esposa y juntos son padres de un pequeña de un añito a quien quieren mucho y sobre todo luchan cada día para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo llena de amor y ejemplo de lucha. Cuando Cristian tiene un tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear con su familia y en ocasiones jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio y le gusta disfrutar de uno de sus platos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Cuy Chactado”.
Día a día Cristian trabaja como operario de Hornos en una panadería, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de su familia; él  cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es my responsable y sobre todo cuidadoso con su trabajo.

Cristian está muy a gradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como colocación de pisos, refacción de paredes, entre otros, de esta manera podrá ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y poder brindarle más seguridad a su familia”.
texts.en:
Cristian is 33 years old. He lives with his wife and together they are parents of a small one year old girl who they love very much and above all strive every day to be able to give her a decent life, above all full of love and examples of striving. When Cristian has spare time he likes to go out and walk with his family and on occasions play soccer with his friends and neighbors from his neighborhood. He likes to enjoy one of his favorite dishes which is the delicious Cuy Chactado [fried guinea pig]. Day to day Cristian works as an oven operator in a bakery. He works around 8 hours per day and with the fruits of his labor can settle with much effort the expenses of his family. He believes that he is doing well in his work because he is very responsible and above all careful in his work.
