Cristian is very grateful for the Kiva loans since thanks to the help they have offered him he will be able to make improvements in his housing such as placing the flooring and repairing the walls, among other things. In this manner he will be able to offer a better quality of life to his family and continue striving to make his greatest dream a reality: "To give a good education to his child and to be able to offer more security to his family."

loans.use: to improve his housing: placement of flooring, repairing of walls, among other things.

loans.name: Chachita

texts.es:
Chachita es una mujer de 57 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Chachita no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de corte y confección, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Pachamanca d Chancho para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Chachita trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, Chachita trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto con su negocio y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Chachita se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, así también desea comprar materiales de construcción para ponerle piso de concreto a su negocio, así pues ella espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ampliar su negocio y junto a su familia desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Chachita is a 57 year old woman. She lives in the city of Pucallpa with her husband and four children. She loves them very much and they are her main reason for living. She is a very friendly woman, hardworking and enthusiastic, who along with her husband devotes all her efforts to raising the family. Unfortunately Chachita was not able to study for the profession of dressmaking, since from a very young age she had to work to help her parents. In her free time she likes to watch educational programs on television and sometimes she cooks the tasty “Pachamanca de Chancho” (pork and other ingredients such as potatoes, cassava, corn, and beans, cooked on hot stones buried in the ground and seasoned with herbs).

On her own initiative, with a lot of effort and dedication, day after day Chachita works in her little business of selling groceries and drinks. Chachita works from the early morning hours working for approximately twelve hours. She feels happy with her business and believes that it is going well because of the friendly treatment she gives her clients. 

Chachita is very grateful for the Kiva loans, and thanks to the assistance given to her she can buy merchandise for her business. She also wants to buy building supplies in order to put in a concrete floor in her business. She hopes to continue working and striving in order to achieve her big dream of expanding her business and she and her family hope to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy groceries to stock her store and construction materials in order to put in a concrete floor

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven de 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, vive al lado de su esposa quien es su mano derecha y su gran apoyo para seguir luchando cada día. Enrique aprendió desde muy pequeño a trabajar ya que sus padres tenían pocos ingresos y de esta manera el podía apoyarlos. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar uan carrera universitaria.

Día a día Carlos trabaja en su negocio de venta de drywall, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 16 clientes diariamente, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y sobre todo porque es responsable en su trabajo.

Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar herramientas para su trabajo como sierra, medidores, tarimas, entre otros, de esta manera el podrá brindar un mejor servicio y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de diseño de interiores”.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young man of 28 years of age, who lives in the city of Ica.  This is a place that is known for its warm and welcoming climate.  Carlos lives with his wife, who is his right hand and is his greatest support in his efforts to continue to persevere day by day.  Carlos learned to work from the time he was very young, because his parents had little income, and so in this way he was able to support them.  Due to a lack of financial resources, he was only able to get a high school education, but he would have liked to have been able to study at a university.

Each day, Carlos works in his drywall business.  He works about 10 hours a day, and over this time he tends to about 16 customers a day.  He believes that his business is doing well because he is very friendly, and most of all, is responsible in his work.

Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help that they are providing him, he will be able to buy tools for his work, such as: a saw, measuring tools, step stools, and other items.  In this way, he will be able to provide better service and can continue to strive to make his greatest dream a reality: to study for a professional degree in interior design.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Victor Leandro

texts.es:
Víctor es un hombre de 57 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente por diversas razones desde hace varios años se separó de su esposa, desde entonces él se ha dedica a sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Víctor pudo estudiar pequeños cursos de Gastronomía, los cuales le han servido de mucho para poder poner en marcha su negocio.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Víctor trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, gracias a sus ahorros, Víctor pudo comprarse una cocina semi industrial y acondicionar su negocio, antes él vendía Ceviche, ahora ha ampliado su negocio y vende diversos tipos de alimentos.
Víctor se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mesas y sillas para acondicionar mejor su negocio y poder brindarles mayor comodidad a sus clientes, de esta manera Víctor espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para poder lograr su gran sueño de ver a su hijo convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Víctor is a 57-year-old man. He lives in the city of Pisco with his son, whom he loves and who is his main concern in life. Unfortunately, for various reasons he separated from his wife several years ago. Since then he has dedicated himself to helping his family get ahead. Thanks to his efforts, Víctor was able to take small courses in Gastronomy, which have been very useful to him as he set up his business. 

On his own initiative, with great effort and dedication, Victor works day after day in his small business selling food. Thanks to his savings, Víctor was able to buy a semi-industrial stove and equip his business. Earlier, he sold ceviche; now he has expanded his business and sells diverse types of foods. 

Víctor is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided to him, he will be able to buy tables and chairs to better equip his business and to provide more comfort to his customers. In this way, Víctor hopes to continue working and exerting himself so that he can fulfill his great dream of seeing his son become a successful professional.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for his business.

loans.name: Marieni Odalis

texts.es:
Marieni es una mujer de 46 años, viven en la ciudad de Nazca con sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus hijos; lamentablemente Marieni no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Puré con Bisteck para compartir con su familia, ya que este es su plato favorito.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Marieni trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, Marieni se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por la poca competencia que tiene por su zona y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Marieni se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como gaseosas, refrescos, cervezas, entre otros; de esta manera Marieni tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para lograr su gran sueño de poder brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos, a fin de verlos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Marieni is a 46 year old woman who lives in Nazca with her three children.  She loves her children very much and they are her reason for living.  She is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person. She dedicates all her efforts to getting her family ahead because she is father and mother to her children.  Regrettably, Marieni couldn’t study for a professional degree because she had to work to support her parents from a very young age.  In her spare time, she enjoys watching television and sometimes cooks the delicious “Puré con Bisteck” to share with her family because this is her favorite dish.

Every day, with much determination and dedication, Marieni works at her small business selling drinks.  She begins work every day in the early morning hours and works for about twelve hours.  Marieni is comfortable in her work and believes that it’s going well because of the low competition in her area and the kind treatment she provides to her customers.

Marieni is very grateful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to their support, she will be able to purchase merchandise for her business: sodas, soft drinks, beer, and other products. In this way, Marieni will have a better stocked business and be able to increase sales and increase her income.  This will enable her to achieve her great dream of being able to provide her children with a good education and see them become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Marlene Isabel

texts.es:
Marlene es una mujer de 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su pequeña hija de 4 años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeño, ya que ella es madre y padre para él; lamentablemente Marlene no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Marlene trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de camotes, ella realiza sus ventas en sacos y al por menor, Marlene trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable y respetuoso que brinda a sus clientes.
Marlene se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mas mercadería, ya que se pronto el camote aumentará su precio y desea poder comprar mayor cantidad y así poder generar mejores ventas e ingresos, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su local propio de ventas y poder darle una buena educación a su pequeña.
texts.en:
Marlene is a 33 year old woman. She lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial with her 4 year-old daughter whom she loves and is her principal motivation in life. She is a very kind, enthusiastic and hardworking woman that dedicates all her efforts to raising her child, since she is the mother and father for her. Unfortunately Marlene was not able to study a professional career. Since she was very young she had to work to help her family.
On her own initiative, with much determination and dedication, Marelene works at her small business of selling sweet potatoes. She sells them in retail bags. Marelene works from the early hours of the morning and can do it for approximately 8 hours. She feels at ease doing her work and believes that it is going well due to the kind and respectful treatment that she provides to her customers.
Marlene is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided she will be able to make the purchase of more merchandise. The price of the sweet potato will be increased and she wants to be able to buy in more and be able to generate better sales and revenue. In this way she will continue working and struggling to achieve her great dream of having her own sales shop and being able to give her daughter a good education.

loans.use: to buy sweet potatoes by the sack.

loans.name: Juana Rosa

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer de 61 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Gastronomía, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Cau Cau, el cual es su plato favorito.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre, día a día Juana trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ella trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, Juana se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Juana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como arena, ladrillos, cerámica, pintura, fierros, entre otros; de esta manera podrá hacer la construcción del segundo piso de su vivienda; de esta manera Juana espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para logar sus metas y su gran sueño de ampliar su negocio y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Juana is a 61-year-old woman. She is single and lives in the city of Pisco. She is a very likable, hard-working and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to get ahead. Unfortunately, due to the lack of economic resources and the necessity to work since she was very young, she was not able to study for a professional degree in Gastronomy. In her free time she likes to play sports, and on some occasions she cooks a delicious "Cau Cau" [tripe stew], which is her favorite dish.

With great effort and dedication, and thanks to what she learned from her mother, Juana works day by day in her small business selling food. She starts work in the early morning hours, and she generally works for about 8 hours. Juana feels happy doing her work, and she believes that it is going well for her thanks to the friendly treatment she gives her customers. 

Juana is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided to her she will be able to buy construction materials, such as sand, bricks, ceramic tiles, paint, and metal bars, among other items. In this way she will be able to carry out the construction of the second floor of her home. Juana hopes to keep working and exerting herself to achieve her goals and her great dream of expanding her business and getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Milagros Medalit

texts.es:
Milagros es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su pequeño hijo de 4 años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeño, ya que ella es padre y madre para su pequeño; lamentablemente Milagros no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Cau Cau para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su madre, día a día Milagros trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, ella cuenta con un pequeño puesto de ventas, donde vende prendas de vestir tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien, ya que debido al trato amable brindado, ha podido conseguir buenos clientes que siempre acuden a ella.
Milagros se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como arena, ladrillos, cerámica, pintura, fierros, entre otros; de esta manera podrá hacer la construcción de la parte trasera de su vivienda y algunos acabos en su local de ventas; de esta manera Milagros espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para logar sus metas y su gran sueño de ampliar su negocio y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Milagros is a 22-year-old woman living in the city of Pisco with her little four-year-old son who she loves and is her reason to live.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who focuses all her efforts into raising her little one since she’s both father and mother to him.  Unfortunately, Milagros was unable to study Business Administration since she had to go to work very young to help out her parents.  In her free time she likes to play sports and sometimes cooks a delicious “Cau Cau” [tripe stew with rice] to share with her family.

With much effort and dedication and thanks to her mother’s support, Milagros works day to day in her small business selling clothes.  She has a small sales stand where she sells women’s, men’s and children’s clothes.  She can work about 12 hours and believes she does well because of 

Milagros is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to buy building materials and supplies like sand, bricks, tile, paint and iron bars, among others to build the rear of her house and to make some finishing touches to her sales stand.  In this way, Milagros hopes to continue working and striving towards reaching her goals and her great dream of enlarging her business and getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Silvia Mandera

texts.en: Mandera says that she benefited a lot from the first loan in these ways: she has increased her stock, bought a fridge, and now taking a another loan to increase on her business stock she has sent all her children to school.  She is happy for the FSSL service offered to her.

loans.use: for buying more items like  meat, beans, and rice.

loans.name: Sophie's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux femmes en caution solidaire. Sophie la responsable est âgée de 30ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 02enfants scolarisés. Le plus âgé a 06ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. Sophie vend du maïs, de la farine de blé et de divers depuis un an puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son fonds de roulement et de satisfaire les besoins de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev. Le revenu supplémentaire généré par ce financement lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et d'aider son mari à achever la construction de leur maison. Sophie se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This is a group made up of two women with a joint guarantee. Sophie, the leader is 30 years old. She is married and has two children who attend school. The older child is six and the younger three. Sophie has been selling  corn, wheat flour and various other products for one year and buys her stock at one of the markets in Benin. In order to reinforce her working capital and to satisfy her customers’ needs, she has requested a loan from Finadev. The supplementary income generated by this loan will enable her to contribute to her children’s education and help her husband to finish the construction of their house. Sophie is on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of corn, 2 boxes of sugar and one sack of flour.

loans.name: Blanca Flor

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer de 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja, a quien ama y agradece todo el apoyo brindado, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Blanca no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer manualidades y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia con mucho empeño y dedicación, gracias a los ahorros que  puedo conseguir de trabajos anteriores, Blanca pudo adquirir una mototaxi, la cual alquila a otros choferes para que brinden servicios de transporte, ella trabaja todos los días y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Blanca se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento general de su mototaxi, de esta manera ella espera seguir trabajando con su negocio de alquiler de su mototaxi y en poco tiempo espera poder adquirir más vehículos para ampliar su negocio; así pues Blanca seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su negocio de manualidades.
texts.en:
Blanca’s a 33-year-old-woman living in the city of Ica with her spouse who she loves and thanks for all the support provided.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person with a strong wish for self-improvement.  Unfortunately, Blanca was unable to study Nursing because she had to go to work very young to help her parents with household expenses.  She likes making crafts in her free time and sometimes cooks a delicious “Carapulcra con Sopa Seca” to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with much effort and dedication and thanks to savings from jobs she was able to get previously, Blanca was able to acquire a mototaxi that she leases to drivers to provide transportation services.  She works every day and thinks she does well because of the gracious customer service she provides.

Blanca is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to repair and service her mototaxi so that she can continue working leasing it.  She hopes in a short time to be able to acquire more vehicles to expand the business and continue working and striving towards reaching her great dream of having a crafts business.

loans.use: to service her mototaxi.

loans.name: Hilda Luz

texts.es:
Hilda es una mujer de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, lastimosamente Hilda sufrió la pérdida de su esposo, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; Hilda no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta vivistar a sus hijos y en alguna de estas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo, el cual es su plato favorito.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Hilda trabaja en su pequeño negocio venta de comida, ella brinda desayunos desde tempranas horas de la mañana, Hilda puede trabajar por un aproximado de 8 horas diarias, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Hilda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una olla arrocera pequeña, sillas y podrá realizar la refacción de su refrigerador; de esta manera Hilda tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado para poder seguir brindando sus servicios, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para poco a poco poder ampliar su negocio y así poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Hilda is a 47 year old woman and lives in the city of Ica. Unfortunately Hilda suffered the loss of her husband. Since then she has been devoting all her efforts to get ahead for her family. She is a very nice, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who has a great desire for improvement. Hilda was not able to study the professional career of nursing that she wanted to, but she would very much have liked to be able to do so. In her spare time she likes to visit her children and on some of these occasions cooks a delicious Arroz con Pollo [chicken with rice], which is her favourite dish.

Of her own initiative, with much determination and dedication, day to day Hilda works in her small business selling food. She offers breakfasts from the early hours of the morning. Hilda can work for approximately 8 hours daily. She feels at home working and believes that she is doing well because of the kind service that she offers her customers.

Hilda is very grateful for the Kiva loans, since thanks to the help offered she will be able to buy a small rice pot and chairs, and will be able to repair her refrigerator. In this manner Hilda will have her business in better condition to be able to continue offering her services, so she will continue working and making efforts to expand her business little by little and thus be able to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy a small rice pot and chairs.

loans.name: Erick Alexander

texts.es:
Erick es un hombre de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con su pareja y su pequeño hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amble, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Erick no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Agrónoma, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Erick trabaja como obrero de campo en una empresa agrícola de su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana, Erick trabaja en el área de raleo, él puede trabajar por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Erick se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que ala cercarse la época de lluvias en su ciudad necesita realizar el techado de una habitación; de esta manera Erick tendrá su vivienda en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras, las cuales brindarán mayor seguridad y bienestar para él y su familia, así pues Erick seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder convertirse en un buen profesional y así poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Erick is a 20 year old man who lives in the city of Ica in the Parcona district. He lives with his partner and his young son. He loves both of them, and they are his reason for living. Erick is a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person, who has dedicated all his efforts to helping his family get ahead. Unfortunately Erick was not able to study for a professional career in agricultural engineering, but he would have very much liked to have done so. In his free time, Erick likes to play sports and sometimes cooks a delicious arroz con pollo (chicken with rice) to share with his family.

Of his own initiative, and with much effort and dedication, Erick works as a laborer in an agricultural business in his city. He works every day, starting in the early hours of the morning. Erick works pruning and trimming vines. He works about 10 hours daily, and thinks that his work is going well because of his good efforts and the kind way in which he treats others. 

Erick is very grateful to Kiva lenders, thanks to whose support he will be able to make improvements to his home. It is nearing the rainy season in his city, and he needs to complete the roof of a room. Erick's home will be in adequate and secure condition, resulting in more security and well-being for him and his family. Erick will continue working and striving to achieve his great dream of becoming a respected professional and moving his family ahead.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan tiene 46 años de edad él vive en Chimore de la provincia Carrasco, de la ciudad de Cochabamba él se encuentra separado con la señora Natividad con la cual tiene tres hijos,  Juan trabaja como chofer. Juan  vivía en Arani hace como veinte años atrás él tuvo que venir a Chimore porque no tubo ingresos suficientes para poder mantener a su familia,  Juan lo dejo toda sus pertenencias por la separación que tuvo con la esposa, él se volvió a levantar solo y  tomo un nuevo rumbo en su camino empezó de cero, ahora él tiene un vehículo con el que trabaja como chofer en un sindicato.  El préstamo que solicita Juan es para la compra de lote para construir su casa y de esa manera podrá tener donde vivir con mejores condiciones de vida. Juan sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijos ya que el no pudo terminar el colegio ni hacer una carrera, pero él quiere que su hija si pueda realizar una carrera y poder ayudar a las personas de la zona.
texts.en:
Juan is 46 years old and lives in Chimore in the province of Carrasco in Cochabama city. He is separated from Natividad with whom he has three children. Juan works as a driver. Juan lived in Arani twenty years ago, he had to come to Chimore because his income wasn’t enough to support his family. Juan left all his belongings because of his separation with his wife. He got up again and took a new path, starting with nothing. Now he has a house in an urban area of Chimore in the town of Cesarzama where he lives and works with his vehicle. That’s one of the ways that he receives his income as well as working as a driver making it into the union on June 2nd. 

Juan is requesting this loan to purchase an agricultural lot so that he can build his home. Juan dreams of a better future for his children. He couldn’t finish school nor have a career so he wants his daughter to be able to have a career and be able to help people in the area.

loans.use: to purchase a lot to build his home

loans.name: Eleutorio Juan

texts.es:
Eleutorio es un hombre de 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su hijo de 20 años, a quien ama y  es su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; Lamentablemente Eleutorio no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Eleutorio trabaja en su pequeño negocio de vulcanizado, adicionalmente el también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de comida, él trabaja desde tempranas horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amble que brinda a sus clientes.
Eleutorio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una cocina pequeña ya que la que tiene actualmente ya este deteriorada, tres andamios, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder exhibir los productos que vende y así también comprará mesas y sillas, ya que en la parte delantera de su hogar atenderá a mas clientes; de esta manera Eleutorio tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado para seguir brindando sus servicios, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Eleutorio is a 51-year old man living in Cañete, District of Imperial with their 20-year old son, whom he loves and considers the main reason in his life. He is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person working to get ahead.

Unfortunately, Eleutorio could not study for a professional career, since he had to work with his parents from an early age. Through his own initiative with considerable effort and dedication, Eleutorio works daily on his own tire repair business. He also has a small business selling food. He starts work very early and thinks that he’s doing well because of his dedication and good customer service.

Eleutorio is very thankful with KIVA lenders since thanks to their help he will be able to buy a small kitchen replacing the currently deteriorated one and three shelves that will help him exhibit his products.  He will also buy tables and chairs to have more clients in the front part of the house. This way, Eleutorio will have his business better conditioned to continue providing services. He will continue working and hopes to one day have his own separate house.

loans.use: to buy a kitchen, tables, and chairs.

loans.name: Elezon

texts.en:
Elezon, a 30-year-old businessman, has benefited a lot from the previous loan. He has increased his stock, paid part of his children's school fees and is now planning to open a depot with the new loan that he got. 

Elezon is happy for the FSL loan.

loans.use: to purchase items like maize grains.

loans.name: Wicyererwa/sk Group

texts.fr:
Jean Claude, père d’un enfant qui a 3 ans, il est âgé de 24 ans. Son enfant n’a pas encore atteint l’âge d’aller à l’école. Jean Claude n’a aucune autre personne en sa charge. Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est de six ans de l’école primaire.
Il a commencé de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2011. Il est au troisième cycle et les deux premiers cycles sont  bien remboursés.
Avec le présent crédit, il va acheter 75 kilos des engrais chimiques, il  va louer le champ et le préparer.
La mort, l’inondation ou les catastrophes naturelles sont les difficultés de non remboursement qu’attend Monsieur Jean Claude.
Comme stratégies, il va augmenter des champs cultivables et faire l’agriculture du riz d’une façon moderne.
Il a l’ambition d’être le grand agriculteur du riz qui le fait professionnellement.
Pour sa famille, il va scolariser et faire soigner ses enfants et  habiter dans une belle maison. 
A part d’activité financée, il fait le commerce de boutique et fait l’élevage des porcs.
Autre information intéressante lui concernant est qu’il va construire une maison commerciale.

loans.use: Achat des engrais chimiques, preparation du champs et location du champs

loans.name: Evelyn Del Pilar

texts.es:
Evelyn es una mujer de 32 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Evelyn pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajando y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Evelyn trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de útiles de escritorio y libros, adicionalmente también vende juguetes para niños, ella trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, Evelyn se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le  va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Evelyn se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias  a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de juguetes, ya que pronto se acercan las fiestas navideñas y desea poder incrementar sus ventas; de esta manera Evelyn seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y desea poder lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Evelyn is 32 years old. She is single and lives in the city of Ica. She is a very friendly, hard working and enthusiastic person and has a strong desire to succeed. Thanks to her effort and the support of her family, Evelyn was able to study Education. In her free time, she enjoys working and occasionally cooking a delicious Chuafa Rice dish to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with a lot of effort and dedication, Evelyn works every day in her small business, selling office supplies and books. She also sells toys for children. She works approximately 10 hours a day, starting very early in the morning. Evelyn enjoys working and believes it is going well because of her sense of responsibility and the kind treatment she offers her customers.
 
Evelyn is very thankful for Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided, she is able to buy a greater quantity of toys for the upcoming holidays, during which she hopes to increase her sales. In this way, Evelyn will continue working and striving to move forward. She hopes to one day achieve her dream of having her own house.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Kevin Jesus

texts.es:
Kevin es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Kevin no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería de Sistemas que deseaba, ya que tuvo que trabajar desde muy joven para apoyar a sus padres, pues son muy humildes, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Kevin trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, él trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y se encarga del cultivo y empaquetado de los productos, Kevin puede trabajar por un aproximado de 8 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Kevin se encuentra muy agradecido clon los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una pequeña cocina, ya que la tiene actualmente es de kerosene y está en malas condiciones; de esta manera Kevin espera poder seguir trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante al lado de su familia y espera poder cumplir su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Kevin is 20 years old. He is single and lives in the city of Ica with her parents and brothers. He is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Unfortunately, Kevin has not been able to study System Engineering as he would have liked, because he had to start working very young to help his parents, as they are very poor. During his free time he enjoys watching TV and occasionally cooking a delicious Rice with Duck dish to share with his family. 

On his own initiative and with a lot of effort and dedication, Kevin works every day as a field worker on a farm in his city. He works from very early in the morning and is in charge of the crop and packaging the products. Kevin works about 8 hours a day. Kevin enjoys working and believes it is going well because of his good work and the kind treatment he gives the others.

Kevin is very thankful for Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided, he is able to buy a small stove since the one he has currently uses kerosene and is in poor condition. In this way, Kevin hopes to continue working and striving to move forward along with his family. He hopes to one day achieve his dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: July Roxana

texts.es:
July es una mujer de 27 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con su pareja y su pequeña hija, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente July no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, July trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas, adicionalmente también tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana, cuenta con un pequeño puesto de ventas, el cual alquila en un mercado de su ciudad, July puede trabajar por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
July se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como polos, blusas, pantalones, camisas, entre otras prendas de vestir, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, así pues July tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poco a poco poder ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
July is 27 years old. She lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Parcona, with her partner and young daughter, whom she loves and who is her main reason for living. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, together with her partner, strives every day to get ahead in life. Unfortunately, July has not been able to study a professional career since she had to start working very young to help her parents with the household expenses. During her free time, she enjoys playing sports and occasionally cooking a delicious Chicken and Rice dish to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with effort and dedication, July works in her small business, selling drinks. She also has a business selling clothing. She works everyday, starting very early in the morning. She has a small stall which she rents in the city market. July works about 8 hours a day and believes it is going well because of the kind treatment she gives her customers.

July is very thankful for Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided, she is able to buy merchandise for her business, such as polo shirts, blouses, trousers, t-shirts and other clothing for men, woman and children. In this way, July will have a better stocked business and she hopes to increase her sales and income, which will help her expand her business little by little.

loans.use: to buy clothing for her business.

loans.name: Jessenia Raquel

texts.es:
Jessenia es una mujer de 37 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus pequeños; gracias a su esfuerzo Jessenia pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Química, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus pequeños.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jessenia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de yogurt natural, todos los días desde tempranas horas  de la mañana inicia la elaboración de su producto, Jessenia puede trabajar por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Jessenia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de insumos para la elaboración del yogur, tales como leche, azúcar, preservantes, frutas, frutas secas, entre otros; de esta manera Jessenia seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Jessenia is 37 years old, and lives in the city of Pisco with her two young children whom she loves more than anything. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person, who gives everything she has to help get her family get ahead since she supports her children on her own. Thanks to her own efforts, Jessenia was able to study chemical engineering, and in her free time she enjoys playing with her children. 

Through her own initiative, and with much effort and dedication, Jessenia works in a small business selling natural yogurt. She works every day, beginning production very early in the morning, and she works about 10 hours a day. Her business is doing well thanks to her dedication and the friendly treatment she offers her clients. 

Jessenia is very grateful for the Kiva loans, as thanks to the help provided she is able to buy ingredients for her yogurt such as milk, sugar, preservatives, fruits, nuts and others. As a result, Jessenia is able to continue working hard to achieve her dream of providing for her children so they can become professionals and good men.

loans.use: Para la compra de insumos

loans.name: Gianmarco

texts.es:
Gianmarco es un hombre de 21 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, quienes eran muy humildes y no podían cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Gianmarco trabaja como obrero en una granja de pollos de su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Gianmarco se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de 8 cerdos y materiales de construcción, tales como madera, fierros, alambres, clavos, entre otros, para poder hacer la construcción de un pequeño corral para la crianza de sus cerdos; de esta manera Gianmarco espera poder seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una granja de crianza de diversos animales, así pues él desea salir adelante y ver a su pequeño convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Gianmarco is 21 years old and lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial, with his wife and their small child whom they love very much. He is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person, who together with his wife dedicates all his effort to supporting the family. Unfortunately he was not able to study a professional career, as since he was very young he has had to work in order to support his parents who are very humble and don't have enough resources to cover all of their living expenses.  

Through his own initiative, and with much effort and dedication, on a daily basis Gianmarco works as a laborer on a chicken farm in his city. He works approximately 10 hours a day and enjoys his work, and believes he does well because he treats others well. 

Gianmarco is very grateful for Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they provide he will be able to buy 8 pigs and construction materials like wood, screws, nails, and others in order to construct a small corral in which to raise them. This way Gianmarco is hoping to continue working and dedicating himself to his dream of having his own farm where he can raise various types of animals. It is through this business that he plans to get ahead and become an independent professional.

loans.use: to buy pigs and construction materials

loans.name: Rosa Yolanda

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 50 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Mala con su esposo y sus 2 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Rosa pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Psicología, en sus ratos libres le gusta visitar a su familia y en algunas de estas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Frejoles con Seco para compartir con ellos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años Rosa trabaja como psicóloga en una centro médico de su ciudad, adicionalmente ella también brinda servicios particulares, Rosa trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a sus pacientes.
Rosa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de los materiales de estudios de sus hijos, ya que ambos están próximos a iniciar sus clases universitarias, de esta manera Rosa espera poder brindarlos los materiales necesarios para que ellos puedan cursar satisfactoriamente sus estudios, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Rosa is 50 years old and lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Mala, with her husband and 2 children whom she loves very much. She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person, who together with her husband works very hard to support her family. Thanks to her hard work and the support of her family, Rosa was able to study psychology. In her spare time she likes to visit her family and she usually cooks a traditional bean dish that she brings to share with them. 

With much work and dedication, Rosa has worked as a psychologist for many years in a clinic in her city. Rosa works every day for approximately 8 hours a day, and begins work very early in the morning. She does well and believes this is a result of her good service and the kindness with which she treats her patients. 

Rosa is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help she will be able to buy school materials for her children who are both about to begin university classes. Rosa hopes to provide them with all of the necessary materials so they can complete their courses satisfactorily, and she is working very hard towards her dream of having her children become good professionals.

loans.use: To buy school supplies for her children

loans.name: Jeferson Erick

texts.es:
Jeferson es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su tía y su hermano, a quienes ama y agradece todo el apoyo brindado, lastimosamente Jeferson sufrió la pérdida de sus padres cuando era muy pequeño, desde entonces él se ha esforzado por salir adelante, Jeferson es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven ha tenido la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Jeferson trabaja como obrero, él es ayudante de maestros de obras que se dedican al rubro de la construcción, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, adicionalmente los fines de semana trabaja como chofer de taxi, brindando servicios de transporte.
Jeferson se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder hacer el tarrajeo y cubrir los gastos de las instalaciones eléctricas de su hogar, así pues él desea tener su vivienda en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras, que brindan mayor seguridad y bienestar para él y su familia, de esta manera Jeferson seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Jeferson is 20 years old, single, and lives in Nazca with his aunt and brother. He loves them very much and appreciates the support they provide him. Sadly, Jeferson lost his parents when he was very young, and since then he has worked very hard to get ahead. Jeferson is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person, who is very driven to improve his situation. He has not been able to study a profession, as since he was very young he has had to work in order to support himself. In his free time, he likes to relax and listen to music, and occasionally will cook a traditional Peruvian dish (Lomo Saltado) to share with his family. 

Through his own hard work and effort, Jeferson works as a laborer. He helps on various construction projects and puts in about 10 hours a day. On the weekends, he also works as a taxi driver. 

Jeferson is very grateful to Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help he will be able to make some home improvements to the house he shares with his family. He would like to complete the finishing details and cover the costs of electrical installation. This way, he will able to live in a home with better conditions, that is safer and more adequate to the needs and wellbeing of his family. Jeferson will continue to work very hard in order to complete his dream of finishing the construction of his house.

loans.use: to make home improvements

loans.name: 1 De Marzo Group

texts.es:
El comité “1° de Marzo” tiene 15 miembros, donde cada una tiene su trabajo y se esfuerza al máximo para poder hacerlo y por medio de eso ayudar a su familia.
Patrocinia es miembro del grupo, ella tiene una bodega donde vende todo tipo de bebidas, como ser cervezas, vinos, whiskys y demás. Cuenta que cada día tiene más ventas, en especial los fines de semana. Su meta es poder seguir agrandando su negocio.
Solicita este crédito para la compra de bebidas en general, para surtir su negocio y de esa forma seguir dando la variedad a la que están acostumbrados sus clientes.
texts.en:
“1° de Marzo” (First of March) has 15 members, each of which have their own job and put the most effort capable into doing it. They do this so they can help their families.

Patrocinia is a member of the group. She has a bodega where she sells all kinds of drinks, which can be beer, wine, whiskey, and other things. 

She states that each day she is selling more, especially on weekends. Her goal is to continue growing her business.

She is requesting this loan to buy all types of  drinks so she can stock her business up. This way she will continue to give a variety, to which her clients are accustomed.

loans.use: to buy a variety of alcoholic drinks for sale in her store.

loans.name: Vorn

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village in the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, Vorn is 48years old and the mother of two children.  For the past 10 years, rice farming and orange planting have been the main sources of her family’s income.  The main challenge for her family’s business is low crop yield during harvest season, which is often the result of flooding. Through her current business, she earns her about 28,000 KHR per day and she manages to save about 12,000 KHR each day after offsetting daily expenses.

This is Vorn’s first loan cycle with VisionFund.  Now she is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 KHR.  She is going to use this loan to buy a decent motorbike as transportation to support her farming business. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income so that she can improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a decent motorbike as transportation.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 48 years old and a farmer who raises cattle. He is married and has four children, and all are in school. He has been raising cattle for the last ten years. He also earns an income through farming. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya his lifestyle has improved. He hopes that one day he will expand his business and raise more livestock. He requires a loan of 84,442 KES to buy sheep, cows and goats.

loans.use: to buy sheep, cows and goats.

loans.name: Bernabe Quimi

texts.es: Bertha tiene 31 años de edad estado civil divorciada y tiene 2 hijos que estudian en una escuela pública ubicada cerca de su casa. Ella empezó en su negocio de venta de vivieres en general con una pequeña tienda en la cual tenía una refrigeradora y allí guardaba carnes pollos y legumbres. Actualmente tiene dos congeladores y varias vitrinas donde vende snack legumbres. Ella trabaja de lunes a domingo de 8 desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Con el crédito comprara legumbres, carnes, bebidas etc.
texts.en:
Bertha is 31 years old, divorced, and has two children who study in the public school near her home. She started her business a few years ago selling groceries from a small store that had a refrigerator where she kept her chickens and beans. She currently has two large freezers and various display cases where she sells her snacks and other goods. She works from Monday through Sunday, from 8 in the morning until 10 at night. 

With this loan, she will buy beans, meats, drinks, and other goods to stock her shop.

loans.use: to buy beans, meat, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Jose Cesar

texts.es: José tiene 54 años de edad es casado y tiene hijos que son mayores de edad por lo que son in independientes. Su esposa tiene una pequeña boutique. José  a raíz de perder su empleo el trato de buscar empleo en otra empresa pero nadie le abrió las puertas para trabajar es por eso que decidió alquilar un taxi para conducirlo y llevar dinero a su casa. En la actualidad de lo había ahorrado el pudo comprarse un carro y ahora es conductor de su carro realiza fletes dentro y fuera de su ciudad. Con el préstamo comprar llantas nuevas y arreglara el carro, y invertirá dinero en el boutique de su esposa. Su meta trazada es comprarse otro carro y mejorar el boutique de su esposa
texts.en:
José is 54 years old, married, and has grown children. His wife has a small boutique shop. José lost his job a while ago and as he was having difficulty finding work, decided to rent a taxi in order to work as a taxi driver and bring money home. He has currently saved enough to buy himself a car, and he provides services both within and outside of the city. 

With this loan, he will buy new tires and make some repairs to the car, as well as invest some of the money in his wife's shop. His goal is to be able to buy another car and improve his wife's business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and fix his car, as well as to invest in his wife's shop

loans.name: Mugoma Farmers Group

texts.en:
Proscovia is a member of the above mentioned group where each one guarantees the other in accessing a loan. She is fifty years old and a hardworking lady with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda.

Her main business is a retail shop and she also trades in cattle. Her major hardship is bad debtors while her dreams are to own a wholesale shop and a ranch. Proscovia intends to use the loan to buy sugar, maize flour and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, maize flour and beans to sell

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 31 years old. He is a taxi driver who has been in business for four years. He is married and is blessed with one child. He also owns a shop and operates a small-scale business. He is very hardworking as he has to support his family and also provide quality services to his customers. Since he became a client of Faulu Kenya, he has become very cooperative and focused.
 
He hopes to become a millionaire one day and expand his business. To make his dream come true, he requires a loan of 42,727.50 KES to open another retail shop.

loans.use: to open another retail shop

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba is a petty trader. She sells cassava, plantain, fried fish, pepper, tomatoes and other food items at Ampayin, near Cape Coast.  She is married and has three children. Aba has been in business for three years. She uses her income to help her husband pay their housing bills. Her loan will be used to purchase foodstuffs, such as plantain, cassava, yams, vegetables (tomatoes and peppers) and garden eggs for sale. She hopes to use her new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs, such as plantain, cassava, yams, vegetables (tomatoes and peppers) and garden eggs for sale.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en: Bernard Joko, a married father of three, owns a music disc and tape shop in Abura that sells dvds, audio cds, and video cds.   Bernard has been in this business for some years now, using his income for the general support of his family. He will use this loan to acquire a variety of discs to satisfy his customers. With the new profits arising from this loan, he hopes to give his children the best education possible.

loans.use: to acquire a variety of  dvds, audio cds, and video cds to satisfy his customers.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.en:
This is Pedro, 47, a resident of Tondo, Manila, Philippines. Single, he manages his own household while operating the business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for his everyday expenses.

Pedro operates a salon business. He offers hair styling, hair grooming, manicures and pedicures, and the like. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community.  He earns a minimum of Php 1,000 in sales every day.

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a Php 21,000 loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy supplies for his salon, like shampoo, hair treatment creams and oils, and other things needed for his business. He expects a boost in his business income as he expands his business.  

Pedro dreams to expand his business and hopes to have a house in Manila through all his hard work on his business. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for supplies for her salon, like shampoo, hair treatment creams and oils, and other things needed for her business.

loans.name: Kibibi

texts.en: Kibibi is making new investments in her store, where she sells cereals, fruits, and vegetables. She has been running a clothes selling business for several years. Kibibi says that the previous loan helped her open a new line of operation, which is her the current business. However, she is also in her clothes selling business.Both businesses are doing well.Her daughter assists her in her activities.  She is asking for this new loan to buy cereals, fruits, and vegetables to stock her store. By doing this she is sure to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy cereals, fruits, and vegetables to stock her store.

loans.name: Jenny Rosario

texts.es:
Jenny es una mujer de 28 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, con sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para sus pequeños; gracias a su esfuerzo Jenny se encontraba estudiando la carrera de Administración de Empresas, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar, no pudo culminar sus estudios, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para engreír a sus hijos, ya que este es su plato favorito.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jenny trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, especialmente de frituras, tales como pollo broaster, hamburguesas, salchipapas, entre otros, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 6 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por su buena sazón.
Jenny se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una cortadora de papas, una licuadora, sillas y mesas; de esta manera Jenny tendrá mejor acondicionado su negocio, brindando un mejor servicio y comodidad para sus clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jenny is 28 years old and lives in Ica along with her two small children, whom she loves and who are her main reason for living.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman who puts all her effort into getting her family ahead; she is both mother and father to her children.  Jenny was studying management, unfortunately she had to go to work due to lack of resources and was not able to continue her studies. She likes to cook a delicious Carapulcra with dried noodles in her spare time, to energize her children.  This is her favorite dish.


Jenny works her small business, food sales, with great effort and dedication.  She sells broasted chicken, hamburgers, and salchipapas among other things.  She begins working daily from early morning and works for about six hours.  She feels comfortable doing her work and believes that things are going well for her because of her responsible behaviors and because of the delicious seasoning in her food.


Jenny is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, she is able to buy potatoes, a blender, chairs, tables, and in this way better equip her business and provide better service and comfort to her customers.  She will continue to make an effort, work to get ahead, and achieve her dream of owning her own home.

loans.use: to buy a blender, tables, and chairs.

loans.name: Ketty Maribel

texts.es:
Ketty es una mujer de 22 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Ketty pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, en sus ratos libres le gusta bailar y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines Rojos para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ketty trabaja brindando clases particulares a niños, ella cuenta con un pequeño espacio en su vivienda en el dicta sus clases de reforzamiento, ella puede trabajar por un aproximado de 6 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su paciencia y por el trato amable que brinda a sus alumnos.
Ketty se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una computadora, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder brindar de manera didáctica una mejor enseñanza para sus alumnos, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder trabajar en un centro educativo de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Ketty is a 22 year old woman.  She’s single and lives in with her parents and brothers in Ica, within the Parcona district.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with a great desire to succeed.  Thanks to her efforts and help from her family she was able to study education.  She likes to dance in her spare time and on occasion cook some delicious “Tallarines Rojos” to share with her family.

With great effort and dedication, Ketty works as a tutor for children.  She has a small space in her home where she gives refreshment classes and where she can work about six hours daily.  She feels that things are going well for her because she treats her students so well.

Ketty is grateful to Kiva for the loans which have allowed her to buy a computer, which helps her very much to teach classes in a better manner.  She will be able to keep working toward her great dream of working at an education center in the city.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Javier Aldo

texts.es:
Javier es un hombre de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y su hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Javier no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones su esposa cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para engreírlo, ya que este es su plato favorito.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años Javier trabaja en el rubro de la construcción como maestro de obras, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos acabados que les da a sus trabajos.
Javier se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como arena, cemento, fierros y otros; de esta manera Javier podrá terminar la construcción de su vivienda, así él podrá brindar mayor seguridad, bienestar y un ambiente más adecuado para el buen desarrollo de su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a su hijo convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Javier is a 47 year old man and lives with his wife and son in Ica.  He loves them and they are his main reason for living.  He is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic man who dedicates all of his effort to getting his family ahead.  Unfortunately Javier was not able to study for a professional career because he had to go to work when he was very young, but he would have liked to do it.  He likes to play soccer in his spare time and sometimes cooks a delicious chicken with rice dish to enjoy.  It’s his favorite dish.

He has been working as a construction laborer for several years and works daily beginning early morning and can work up to 12 hours a day.  He feels comfortable doing his work and believes that things are going well for him because of the good work he does.

He is very grateful for the Kiva loans which have allowed him to buy building materials such as sand, cement, iron bars, and other things.  This will allow him to finish building his house and be able to provide better security and a better environment for his family.  He will continue to work toward his goal of watching his son establish himself in a professional career.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Jose Cesar

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 50 años, vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo, tiene cinco hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente José no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años, José trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindando servicios de transporte, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, José puede trabajar por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable y respetuoso que brinda a sus clientes.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento general y la compra de llantas nuevas para su auto; de esta manera José tendrá su mototaxi en mejores condiciones, así podrá seguir brindando sus servicios y en poco tiempo espera poder obtener otra motoaxi, para alquilarla y seguir generando ingresos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
José is a 50 year old man who lives in Chiclayo.  He has five children whom he loves and who are his reason for living.  He is a friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic man who puts forth all his effort to getting his family ahead.  Unfortunately José was not able to study for a professional career and had to go to work when he was very young in order to help his parents with the household expenses.  He likes to watch educational TV shows in his spare time and sometimes likes to cook a rice with duck dish to share with his family.

He’s been working as a moto-taxi driver for several years, providing transportation services.  He works every day from early morning and goes out to travel along the streets in search of passengers.  He works about 12 hours daily and believes that things are going well for him because of the good and respectful service he gives his customers. 

José is very grateful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to them he is able to maintain his vehicle and buy new tires.  In this way José can have his taxi in better conditions so that he can continue generating income to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to maintain his moto-taxi.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con su esposo y su hijo de 16 años, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Jorge no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Civil que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso Cau Cau para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 10 años Jorge trabaja como chofer brindando servicios de colectivo en su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, Jorge puede trabajar por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento general y la compra de llantas nuevas para su auto; de esta manera Jorge tendrá su auto en mejores condiciones, así podrá seguir brindando sus servicios, con el deseo de poder lograr su gran de tener su propia empresa de transporte y así brindarle una profesión a su hijo.
texts.en:
Jorge, 44, lives in the Santiago area of the city of Ica with his wife and his 16-year-old child, both of whom he loves and who are his main motivation in life.  He's a very pleasant, hardworking, and enthusiastic man who dedicates all his effort to getting his family ahead.  Unfortunately, because of a lack of resources and the need to work from a young age, Jorge couldn't study for a career in civil engineering, but he very much would like to have done so.  In his free time he likes to watch educational programs on television, and sometimes he cooks a delicious tripe dish to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with a lot of effort and dedication, Jorge has worked as a driver for 10 years offering taxi service in his city.  He works every day from early in the morning, and drives through the streets of his city looking for passengers.  He works approximately 10 hours and believes it's going well for him because of the pleasant way he treats others.

Jorge's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to do general maintenance on his car and buy new tires.  This way Jorge will have his car in better condition and he'll be able to continue offering his services.

He wants to be able to realize his big dream of having his own transportation company so he can give his son a profession.

loans.use: to do general maintenance on his car and to buy tires

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia nació en la provincia de La Convención pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 43 años de edad es soltera, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la distribución de productos energéticos como por ejemplo Red Bull, Burn, Maltin Power y entre otros. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos energéticos. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member was born in the province of La Convención but she lives in the beautiful city of Cuzco.  She is 43 years old and single. She belongs to the communal bank “Santa Rosita de Lima” which belongs to the Asociación Arariwa.

Her main business activity is the distribution of energy products such as Red Bull, Burn, Maltin Power and others. She has been involved in this business for two years and it is going very well. On this occasion, Maribel needs the loan to purchase more energy products. Maribel is grateful to those who, by means of these funds, enable her to fulfil her aspirations, and she promises to pay the installments on time.

loans.use: to buy more energy products.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 60 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ella es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos que ya son mayores, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente María no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayuda a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso Locro para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años María trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de leche, ella cuenta con un pequeño establo de vacas, las cuales cría para poder ordeñar y obtener la leche para su venta, María trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
