Elias is to be linked with CHW in Kisumu town  and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation.

Elias will also use the income generated from his motorcycle taxi business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his bike.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle to support Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Benson   Mwaura

texts.en:
Benson  was born in Marumba Village in Kakamega County, he is married with children. Benson has been involved in Motorcycle Taxi Business for three years, he wants to own a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community, Benson  is to be linked with CHW working in Kakamega and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. 

Benson hopes to recruit other members of his youth organization to join in supporting community health outreach programme in his community.

Benson will also use the income generated from his motorcycle micro- business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his motorcycle

loans.use: To buy Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Julius  Ogutu

texts.en:
Julius was born in  Homa Bay District County, He is married with children and is engaged in retail small scale business. Julius says at his age of 55 he wants to make a difference in his community by supporting community health outreach programme run by a Community Based Organization CBO in his county. 

He has committed to spend most of the time with the CHW counseling the youth on reproductive health issues. Julius is happy to own his own motorcycle and would like to make a difference in his community by supporting the community health work  He  will support  the CHW undertake his normal routine once a week by providing transportation for visits to patients, and other hygiene camps. 

Julius will also use the income generated from his motorcycle taxi business to support his family he plans to buy another motorcycle and support two CHWs in 12 months time.

loans.use: To buy Motorcycle to Support Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: John Onyango

texts.en:
John  has been renting a motorcycle for taxi work for three years. He  is married with two children and lives in a heavily populated suburb of Kisumu  City. John has committed to   provide transport to CHWs targeting heavily populated slum providing peer support to youth groups Owning his own bike makes him feel motivated to work for himself and his community.

By owning his own bike, John will also be able to provide for his family and support the community as well, John belongs to a motorcycle taxi association and hopes to encourage many more members to join in supporting the CHW work in heavily populated areas of Kisumu City

loans.use: To buy a Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: John Owino

texts.en:
John  was born in Magoya village and has beeen working on a rented motorcycle for for three years. He  is married with two children and lives in Siaya County.  John has committed to  provide transport to CHWs working in a local CBO in Siaya. He aims to target the youth especially young boys providing peer support. John is happynto own a motorcycle, he says he will give back to his community one day every week, he is ready to start and sto send his progress report.

 John will also be able to provide for his family and support the community as well, John belongs to a motorcycle taxi association and hopes to encourage many more members to join in supporting the CHW work in working very closely with the local health outreach CBO.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle to support Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Dennis  Onyango

texts.en:
Dennis has been renting a motorcycle for micro-business work for three years. He  is married with two children and lives in a heavily populated suburb of Kisumu  City. Denis has committed to  provide transport to CHWs targeting youth groups and patients.

Dennis says owning the bike is great but supporting his community is greater. Dennis should also be able to grow his business and provide for his family. Dennis belongs to a business association and hopes to encourage many more members to join in supporting the CHW work in Kisumu City

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle to support Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Gilbert  Osewe

texts.en:
Gilbert  has been renting a motorcycle for taxi work for two years. He is married with two children and lives in Kisumu County . Gilbert has committed to   provide transport to CHWs targeting heavily populated parts of Kisumu  town providing peer support to youth groups counseling on HIV/AIDs prevention. He is happy to on his bike which will go along way in improving his business and supporting his community.

Gilbert will also use the income generated from his motorcycle taxi business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his motorcycle

loans.use: To buy motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Barnaba  Kiptanui

texts.en:
Barnaba was born in Sirwa Village in Nandi, he is married with children. Barnaba has been involved in Motorcycle Taxi Business for three years, he wants to own a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community.

Barnaba  is to be linked with CHW working in Kisumu and will support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. Barnaba hopes to recruit other members of his youth organization to join in supporting community health outreach programme in his community.

Barnaba will also use the income generated from his motorcycle taxi business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his motorcycle

loans.use: To buy Motorcycle for Community Health  Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: George Maurice

texts.en:
George was born in Moch Village in Rarienda District, he is married with children. George has been involved in Motorcycle Taxi Business for two years using a rented motorcycle. He wants to own a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community, George is to be linked with CHW working in East Uyoma and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. George  hopes to recruit other members of his youth organization to join in supporting community health outreach programme in his community.

George's ambition is to become the customer who has made more hours in CHEs work programme. George  will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his motorcycle

loans.use: To buy Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Daniel Mugeta

texts.en:
Daniel was born in East Gem in Siaya district. Daniel is married with children and has been involved in Motorcycle Business for three years, he wants to make a difference in his community by owning  a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community. Daniel is to be linked with CHW working in Siaya  and and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. 

Daniel is excited with his new venture, he hopes to recruit other members of his business organization to join in supporting community health outreach programme in his community.

Daniel will also use the income generated from his motorcycle taxi business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his motorcycle

loans.use: To buy motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Patrick  Etyang

texts.en:
Patrick was born in Amerikwa Village in Teso South, he is married and has a family. Patrick has been involved in Motorcycle small scale business for four years, he wants to own a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community and make a difference. Patrick will be linked with CHW working  in Teso and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. 

Patrick hopes to recruit other members of his small business organization to join in supporting community health outreach programme in Teso community.

Patrick will also use the income generated from his motorcycle taxi business to support his family. He hopes to become a CHW volunteer in his community once he has finished paying for his motorcycle

loans.use: To pay for the Motorcycle for Community Health work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Thomas Musumba

texts.en:
Thomas is a trader and was born in Emachinga Village in Matungu district. he is married with children. Thomas  has been involved in Business for five years, he wants to own a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community, Thomas is to be linked with CHW working in Bungoma and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. Thomas hopes to encourage and recruit other members of his group to join in supporting community health outreach programme in his community.

Thomas  will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family and expand his business. Thomas hopes to to support more youth CHW volunteers in his community by encouraging them to save money and join in a group to buy motorcycles for CHW work and Livelihood support.

loans.use: To pay for Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Maurice Odumba

texts.en:
Maurice is the oldest borrower, he was born in Masita Village. Maurice is a farmer and has been involved in informal business and farming for many years. Maurice wants to own a motorcycle to support the community health work in his community, his motocycle will be linked with CHW working in ndhiwa and will  support the community health worker by providing transport on set days, this will give the needed capacity to the CHW to be able to reach many more families during  counseling appointments and health visitation. Maurice hopes to support the community health outreach programme by encouraging the youth to follow health advices given by CHWs and other community health teams.

Maurice will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his larger family repair his house and buy a grade cattle.

loans.use: To buy a Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Timothy  Nyiro

texts.en:
Timothy  was born in Gongoni Village in Malindi Kenya . He is married with children and is engaged in retail small scale business. Timothy wants to make a difference in his community and town of Malindi by engaging community health outreach programme run by a Community Based Organization CBO in Malindi 

He has also committed to spend most of his free time with the CHW counseling the youth on avoiding anti social practices, drug abuse and AIDs/HIV prevention. Timothy is happy to own his own motorcycle and is ready to give back to the community as a trainee CHW volunteer.

Timothy will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family he plans to buy another motorcycle and support more CHWs in future

loans.use: To buy Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan Manuel tiene 45 años de edad y desde hace 20 años se dedica a la comercialización de leche en la vereda sabaneta del municipio de Bello, Colombia. Esta actividad le ha permitido sostener a sus padres con quienes reside. Su mayor sueño es poder tener bastante ganado para incrementar su capacidad de producción y poder satisfacer la demanda de su localidad. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una vaca lechera y cuido. Desea mejorar su situación económica para ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
Espera que su sueño comience a materializarse con la aprobación de dicho crédito.
texts.en:
Juan Manual is 45 years old and for the past 20 years he has been selling milk on Sabaneta street in the town of Bello, Colombia. This business has enabled him to support his parents, with whom he lives. 

His greatest dream is to earn enough to increase his production capacity so that he is able satisfy local demand. For this reason he is requesting a loan in order to purchase a dairy cow and care for it. He wants to improve his economic situation so he can provide a better quality of life for his family.

He hopes that his dream will begin to materialize with approval of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase and care for a dairy cow.

loans.name: James Ngesa

texts.en:
James was born in Kaya village, Siaya County. He is married with children and is engaged in retail small scale business. James wants to make a difference in his community and town of Siaya by engaging community health outreach programme run by a Community Based Organization CBO in the district.  

He has also committed to spend most of his free time with the CHW counseling the youth on avoiding anti social practices, drug abuse and AIDs/HIV prevention. James is happy to own his own motorcycle and is ready to give back to the community the free tranport services to CHW.

James will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family he plans to buy another motorcycle and support more CHWs in future

loans.use: To Pay for Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Agustine  Ochieng

texts.en:
Augustine was born in Kolwa west Kisumu District . He has been doing business using a rented motorcycle for  for two years. He is married with two children and he is happy to own his own bike. Augustine has committed to   provide transport to CHWs targeting the youth and prevention of drug abuse. He is also interested in supporting youth groups counseling on HIV/AIDs prevention. 

The motorcycle will enable Augustine provide for his family and support the community as well, He hopes to encourage other motorcycle taxi drivers enroll in the CHW support programme in order to adequately cover all remote locations of Kisumu county.

Augustine is an experienced motorcycle taxi trader and he hopes to make money and buy another motorcycle in 10 months and support two CHWs.

loans.use: To pay for Motorcycle for Community Health work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Hesbon Okoth

texts.en:
Hesbon has been renting a motorcycle for taxi work for two years. He is married with two children and lives in Siaya County. Hesbon understand motorcycle business quite well and is ready to take up his own motorcycle.Hesbon  has committed to   provide transport to CHWs targeting rural families affected by HIV/AIDs and ARV usage monitoring. He is happy to own the Yamaha crux bike which will go along way in improving his business and supporting his community.

The motorcycle will enable Hesbon provide for his family and support the community and health service deliverance in his County. A small but useful contribution to society. Hesbon belongs to a motorcycle taxi association and hopes to encourage many more members to join in supporting the CHW work in Siaya county. His family is very happy too.

loans.use: To pay  for Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a businessman who been renting a motorcycle for taxi work for two years. He is married with two children and lives in Kisumu County. Andrew has committed to   provide transport to CHWs targeting remote villages in Kisumu county providing peer support to youth groups and counseling on HIV/AIDs prevention. He is happy to on his bike which will go along way in improving his business and supporting his community.

The motorcycle will enable Andrew  provide for his family and support the community as well, Andrew will also encourage many more members to join in supporting the CHW work in this beautiful tourist port of Lamu. Andrew is commited in leading other business people to engage in suporting CHW support programme.

loans.use: To buy a Motorcycle for  Community  Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Amos Ouma

texts.en:
Amos lives in Nakuru in Kenya Rift Valley province. Amos is well versed with  Motorcycle Micro  business, Amos has been renting a motorcycle for taxi work for several years. He is married with two children and lives in Nakuru County. Amos has committed to   provide transport to CHWs targeting peer support to youth groups counseling on HIV/AIDs prevention. He is happy to own his bike which will go along way in improving his business and supporting his community.

The motorcycle will enable Amos to provide for his family and support his community as well, Amos  belongs to a motorcycle taxi association and hopes to encourage many more members to join in supporting the CHW work in Nakuru

loans.use: To buy a Motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Noel Kosgei

texts.en:
Noel is one of the youngest borrowers. He was born in 1993 in Chepyvan Koibatek district. He is an example of youth empowerment, Noel has however been involved in retail small scale business. Noel is sure that his Motorcycle will make a difference in his community by engaging community health outreach programme run by a Community Based Organization CBO in Nakuru.

He has also committed to spend most of his free time with the CHW counseling the youth on avoiding anti social practices, drug abuse and AIDs/HIV prevention. Noel is happy to own his own motorcycle and is ready to give back to the community as a trainee CHW volunteer in Nakuru.

Noel will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family he plans to buy another motorcycle and support more CHWs in future. Noel wants to lead the youth to volunteer as CHWS in their communities. He aims at recruiting 20 members before the end of the year. 

He has joined a motorcycle taxi association and will enroll as a CHW trainee after finishing paying for his Bike.

loans.use: To buy a Motorcycle for community Health Work and Liveihood support

loans.name: Stephen Otieno

texts.en:
Stephen is 25 years and was born Kibuye Village in Nakuru County. He is married with children and is engaged in retail small scale business. Stephen wants to make a difference in his community and town of nakuru by engaging community health outreach programme run by a Community Based Organization CBO in Nakuru 

He has also committed to spend most of his free time with the CHW counseling the youth on avoiding anti social practices, drug abuse and AIDs/HIV prevention and engaging in sports. Stephen is happy to own his own motorcycle and is ready to give back to the community as a trainee CHW volunteer in 2014.

Stephen will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family, he plans to buy another motorcycle and support more CHWs in future.

loans.use: To pay for motorcycle for Community Health Work and Livelihoods

loans.name: Hadijja

texts.en:
Hadijja is a thirty-three-year-old widow with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. For thirteen years she has been selling salt  which she directly mines from the lake and also buys from retail traders. Good mother that she is, she desires to educate her children to attain degrees as minimum qualification and set up sustainable income-generating activities so as  to secure their future.

Inadequate capital and prolonged rains affect the business, and her business plan is to process the salt. Hadijja is requesting a loan to buy salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy salt to sell.

loans.name: May

texts.en: May is 26 years old with two children and lives in the town of Masindi, Uganda. She is a market vendor, selling second-hand clothes. Her business is located in the heart of the town thus attracting many customers. Stiff competition and price fluctuations hinder her business while her dream is to expand to new areas. May is requesting a loan to buy second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en: Lilian is 53 years old, married and has been blessed with two children. Raising cattle is what she does to earn a living and she has been in business for 22 years. She also owns rental houses and describes her business as very busy. She is very hard working and through the help of Faulu Kenya, she has learned to save her money for the future. She hopes to add more rental houses and increase her herd of cattle. She requires a loan of 32,298.75 to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Minnie

texts.en:
Minnie is 70 years old, married and has five children. She has been in business for the last 24 years. Her business is doing very well. Faulu Kenya has helped her pay school fees for her children. 

She dreams of being financially stable so that she can support the orphans she is currently living with. Minnie requires a loan of 53,156 KES to buy a cow and cow feed.

loans.use: to buy a cow and cow feed.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 64 years old, a business lady who owns a motorbike. She is married and has eight children. She has been in business for three years. She has employed someone to be in charge of her motorbike. She also sells milk that is produced by her cow. She was previously selling groceries. Thanks to Faulu Kenya she has learnt how to save her money and has increased her profits. 

She hopes to have a fleet of vans and increase her milk production. She requires a loan of 15,643.13 KES to buy spare parts for her motorbike.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her motorbike.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo de 20 años de edad, es un joven pujante y lleno de sueños por cumplir, desde chico siempre soñó con tener su propia empresa y construir un buen futuro para él y su familia. Su arte para la cocina ha sido su mayor aliciente y el causante de que a su corta edad ya se proyecte como un gran hombre de negocios.
La difícil situación económica por la que atravesó su familia, le permitió a este joven ver más allá del problema para encontrar una buena solución. Decidió dedicarse a la venta de comidas rápidas con el propósito de colaborarle a su madre con los gastos del hogar y aminorar la crítica situación por la que atravesaban. Gracias a esta actividad, a mejorado considerablemente su calidad de vida. 
Mateo se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de desechables, carnes frías y gaseosas con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mateo, 20, is a thriving young man who has dreams to fulfill.  Since he was small he always dreamed of having his own business and building a good future for himself and his family.  His cooking skill has been his greatest incentive and the reason he can be a great businessman at his young age.

His family's difficult financial situation allowed this young man to see beyond the problem and find a good solution.  He decided to make a living selling fast food so he could help his mother with the household expenses and reduce the critical situation they were going through.  Thanks to this job his quality of life has improved considerably.

Mateo's requesting a loan to buy disposable items, cold cuts, and sodas so he can increase his sales and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy disposable items, cold cuts, and soda

loans.name: Loma Buenavista Group

texts.es: El grupo de "Loma Buenavista" está integrado por 12 integrantes son cuatro hombres y dos mujeres, los integrantes del grupo decidieron ponerle así ya que el lugar donde viven está en la cima de un cerro y desde ahí se puede observa un bello panorama boscoso donde las heladas no han perjudico a los arboles el grupo ya existía anteriormente. Don Carlos quien es el represntante del grupo platica que tiene 43 años de edad esta casado con la señora Eulalia juntos han formado una familia con cuatro hijos que aun dependen de ellos de los cuales solo uno asiste a la escuela. Don Carlos es un hombre muy trabajador siempre esta al pendiente de que su familia no le hago falta lo necesario es por eso que desde hace 2 años inicio con la crianza de borregos junto con su esposa Eulalia ya que es ella quien cuida de los borregos mientras que don Carlos trabaja en otro parte del pais, Es por eso que Don Carlos esta solicitando un credito a la institucion para poder comprar sus borregitos pequeños para criarlos y esperar hasta cuando ya estan grandes para venderlos Don Carlos comenta que es un poco dificil encontrar un buen comprardor ya que los que comunmente se encuntra le pagan muy poco y a el no le conviene eso, Don Carlos comento: "Me gusta mucho la crianza de estos borregos ya que son animales que crecen muy rapido y los podemos vender cuando estamos en una situacion dicildil podemos vender y asi nos ayudamos o tambien cuando estoy sin trabajo" la unica dificultad que presenta Don Carlos es cuando sus borregos llegana a enfermarse y mueren  para don Carlos esto es una perdida de ganacia e inversion, pero apesar de todo tiene grandes metas las de hacer crecer su actividad poara poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y la educacion de sus hijos ya que para el es lo mas importante. Los integrantes del grupo son Santos, Juan, Bonifacia, Beatriz, Omar, Tomasa, Rosario, Yonic quienes invertiran en borregos, Epifania, Armando, Fernando quines invertiran en pollos.
texts.en:
The group "Loma Buenavista" (Loma Beautiful View) is comprised of twelve members, seven men and five women. The members of the group decided to name it that because the area where they live is at the top of a hill and from there you can see a beautiful wooded landscape where the frost does not harm the trees. The group has existed before.

Carlos is the group’s representative. He says that he is 43 years old and is married to Eulalia. Together they have formed a family of four children who are still dependent upon them, and only one of whom attends school. Carlos is a very hard-working man who always makes sure his family doesn't go without their basic needs. It’s for that reason that he began to raise sheep with his wife two years ago. She takes care of the sheep while he works in another part of the country.

Carlos is requesting a loan from the institution in order to purchase sheep so that they can raise them and sell them once they are grown. He states that it is somewhat difficult to find a good buyer, because the ones that are usually around pay him very little and that does not do him much good. He states that: “I really like to raise these sheep because they are animals that grow fast and we can sell them when we are going through difficult times or when I am without work.” The only difficulty that he is presented with is when his sheep get sick and die, which for him is a loss of income and investment.

Despite everything, he has big plans to expand his business. This will help improve his family’s quality of life and his children’s education, which is the most important thing to him.

The members of the group are Santos,Juan,Bonifacia,Beatriz,Omar,Tomasa, Rosario,and Yonic,who invest in sheep. Epifania, Armando,and Fernando invest in chickens.

loans.use: to buy sheep and chickens to raise them

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en: Patricia is a 24-year-old married woman with 2 children. She has a small plantation and has been growing taro and bananas to earn a living for 4 years. She has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, shovels, fertilizers, and crops. She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Patricia hopes to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: buy a wheelbarrow, shovels, fertilizers,..

loans.name: Tito

texts.en:
Tito is 51 years old and lives in Tipan, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. He is single.
 Tito has a sun breaker making business and earns approximately 8,000PHP each month doing this type of work. He has requested a loan to purchase on his sun breaker making business.
 Tito has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Tito hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase on his sun breaker making business.

loans.name: Cleofe

texts.en:
Cleofe is married with six children. Cleofe is 58 years old and lives in Palomoc, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

 She is a farmer and grows hogs to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP for additional working capital.

 Cleofe has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Cleofe hopes to expand her piggery in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase feeds for her hogs

loans.name: Azam

texts.ru: Азам честный и трудолюбивый человек. Ему 27 лет. Он женат и на хорошей женщине, которая является опытной портнихой. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами уже несколько лет Азам занимается услугой установки мраморных плиток. Он имеет хорошую репутацию среди своих коллег и старается выполнить свою работу на хорошем уровне. Он живет вместе женой в старом доме, где нет условия для проживания, то есть его дом не отвечает стандартам жилья. Он должен отремонтировать свой дом до рождения своего 1 ребенка. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Он ждет вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en:
Azam is an honest and hard-working person. He is 27 years old and married to a great woman who is an experienced seamstress. In order to provide his family with all necessities of life, Azam has been installing marble tiles for the past several years. He has a good reputation among his colleagues and always tries to perform his work well.

Azam and his wife live in an old house, which does not meet the most basic living standards. Azam needs to repair his home before the birth of his first child. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase construction materials. Azam is counting on your kindness and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to buy building materials for repairing his house

loans.name: Paola Janhette

texts.es:
Paola tiene 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, es una ciudad ubicada en la hermosa selva peruana, se caracteriza por su flora y fauna diversa así como también la generosidad y  amabilidad de sus pobladores. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho jugar vóley con sus vecinas y amigas de su barrio, pero sobre todo le encanta disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo Ceviche.  Paola es madre de un pequeño d e5 años a l quiere muchísimo y por el cual ella se esfuerza cada día con tal de verlo feliz y sobre todo tenga más oportunidades que ella.

Con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo Paola trabaja como profesora de educación inicial, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque tiene mucha paciencia con los niños y porque le encanta lo que hace.

Paola está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y gracias a ello podrá comprar zapatos para el verano como sandalias, con lo cual podrá tener un ingreso extra y así seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una buen calidad de vida a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Paola, 28, lives in the city of Pucallpa, located in the beautiful Peruvian jungle.  It's known for its diverse flora and fauna as well as for the generosity and friendliness of its residents.  When she has some spare time she very much likes to play volleyball with her neighbors and friends in the neighborhood.  Above all, though, she loves to enjoy one of her favorite dishes, a delicious ceviche.

Paola's the mother of a little one, age 5, whom she loves a lot.  She makes the effort every day to see him happy and especially for him to have more opportunities than she had.  Paola works with a lot of effort and enthusiasm as a primary school teacher.  She works around nine hours a day.  She believes it's going well for her in her job because she's very patient with the children and she loves what she does.

Paola's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because it's the second time they've given her their great support.  Thanks to this she'll be able to buy summer shoes such as sandals to have an extra income and continue striving every day to be able to make her biggest dream a reality: "To have her own house and give her child a good quality of life."

loans.use: to buy summer shoes

loans.name: Sandro Javier

texts.es:
Sandro es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad caracterizada por su clima calido y por su agricultura, en especial el cultivo de uva, con el cual se elabora uno de los licores bandera de nuestro pais el cual es el "Pisco". Cada dia Sandro sale a trabaja desde muy temprano, el se dedica a su trabajo como taxista, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es respetuoso con ellos.

Sandro esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la aydua que le han brindado el podra realziar un mantenimiento general a su vehiculo y poder comprar tambien llantas para su vehiculo, de esta manera podra tener un vehiculo mas seguro y podra mejorar sus ingresos, asi seguira luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener una empresa de taxi".
texts.en:
Sandro is a very hardworking man who lives in the city of Ica.  This is a city that is known for its warm climate and for its agriculture, especially the cultivation of the grapes that are used to make a drink that our country is famous for - the "Pisco" wine.  Every day, Sandro goes out to work in the early morning as a taxi driver.  He works for about 10 hours a day, and he is able to serve about 15 customers a day.  He believes that his business is doing well because he is very friendly with his customers, and most of all, he treats them with respect.

Sandro is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help that they are providing he will be able to do general maintenance work on his vehicle and also buy new tires.  In this way, he will have a safer vehicle, and he will be able to increase his income, so that he can continue to strive to make his greatest dream a reality:" To have a taxi company."

loans.use: to do maintenance work on his vehicle, and to buy tires

loans.name: Leydi Haydee

texts.es:
Leydi es una joven de 22 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposo, con el cual tiene 1 pequeño hijo de 1 años de edad, a quien quiere muchísimo y por el cual daría la vida para poder brindarle una vida digna. Leydi es una joven muy trabajadora, ella con muco esfuerzo llego a iniciar su negocio de venta de abarrotes, al cual le dedica alrededor de 10 horas al dia y puede llegar a atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente, con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y sobre todo sacar adelante a su hijo; ella cree que está saliendo adelante con su negocio porque tiene mucha paciencia con los clientes y sobre todo le pone muchos ganas para poder mejorar cada día.

Leydi está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar vitrinas para su negocio y también comprar mercadería como golosinas, bebidas gaseosas, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Leydi, 22, lives with her husband, with whom she has a small child, age 1, whom she loves very much and for whom she would give her life to be able to give a decent life.  Leydi's a very hardworking young woman.  With a lot of effort she started her business selling groceries, to which she devotes about 10 hours a day, serving up to 15 customers.  With the fruit of her labor she helps her husband with the household expenses and, especially, getting her child ahead.  She believes she's getting ahead with her business because she's very patient with the customers and she does her best to improve every day.

Leydi's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy display cases for her business and also sweets, carbonated beverages, and other merchandise.

This ways she'll be be able to have a greater variety of products to sell and continue striving every day to make her biggest dream come true: "To have her own house."

loans.use: to buy display cases and merchandise

loans.name: Moises Walter

texts.es:
Moises tiene 36 años de edad, es un hombre que a pesar de las adversidades por las cuales ha pasado sigue luchando día a día para salir adelante, sobre todo porque con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. La vivienda de Moises se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy calido y acogedor, asimismo  se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de uva, esparrago, entre otros.
 
Desde muy temprano por las mañanas Moises sale a trabaja en una mototaxi, ya que el ofrece sus servicios de transporte por las calles de la ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente; el cree que esta saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes y porque conduce de manera responsable.

Moises está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo y también un reforzamiento de puertas ya que de esta manera las puertas estarán bien aseguradas y dará mas seguridad a los clientes, así el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Moises is 36 years old. In spite of the adversity he has passed through, he is a man that continues fighting to get ahead, day after day, above all because with the fruit of his labor he supports his parents with their living expenses. Moises's home is located in the city of Ica, which is characterized by having a very warm and cozy climate.  It is also an area where a lot of agriculture is developed, especially the cultivation of grapes and asparagus, among other things.
 
Moises goes out to work in a motortaxi very early in the mornings, offering his transport services in the streets of the city. He works about 8 hours a day and can attend to up to 20 clients each day; he believes that he is getting ahead with his work because he is friendly with the clients and because he drives in a responsible manner.

Moises is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their great help he will be able to perform general maintenance of his vehicle and also the reinforcement of the doors, as this way the doors will be very secure and will be safer for the clients. In this way he will be able to improve his income and keep fighting to make his greatest dream a reality: "To own his own house."

loans.use: to perform general vehicle maintenance and reinforcement of the doors.

loans.name: Gino Andru

texts.es:
Gino es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la cálida ciudad de Chincha, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de uva, frejoles, entre otros. Gino no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria debido a sus pocos recursos económicos, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Mecánica.

Con cada mañana Gino se levanta con muchos ánimos para abrir su pequeño negocio de venta de cervezas y también alquila un taxi, el trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es responsable y sobre todo amable y respetuoso con los clientes.

Gino está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como tarrajeo, refacción de paredes, entre otros; de esta manera el podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una casa propia”.
texts.en:
Gino is a young man of 21 years of age, he lives in the warm city of Chincha which is characterized by having a warm and welcoming climate. There is much agricultural activity, especially grape growing, beans, and others. Gino could not study in the university due to economic reasons, but would have liked to study mechanics. 

Gino gets up each morning with enthusiasm to open his small store selling beer and also renting taxis. He works around 10 hours per day and can serve at least 20 clients. He thinks his business is going well because he is responsible and above all, kind and respectful of the clients.

Gino appreciates the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he can make some improvements to his home, such as repairing walls, among other things. In this way he can improve his way of life and continue fighting to be able to achieve his biggest dream: to have his own home.

loans.use: to make improvements on his house

loans.name: Etevise

texts.en: "Etevise is 19 years old and married with three children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of sugar, flour, vegetable oil, and a frying pan. In the future,Etevise hopes to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services."

loans.use: to buy buy weed spray, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a crowbar

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera y con mucho esfuerzo a logrado sacar adelante a su hijo, sobre todo porque para Rosa su hijo es lo más importante que tiene en la vida. La vivienda de rosa se encuentra en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de uva, espárragos, paprika, entre otros.

Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de venta de juguetes, desde muy temprano Rosa se levanta con muchos ánimos para ir a su negocio, al cual le dedica 8 horas diarias  y puede atender hasta 10 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos llamativos y a un buen precio.

Rosa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como scoters ya que tiene varios pedidos; de esta manera podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Darle una buena profesión a su hijo y seguir luchando para poder ser una gran microempresaria”.
texts.en:
Rosa is 31 years old, a single mother who with a lot of effort has managed to bring up her son, and to Rosa her son is above all the most important thing that she has in life. Rosa’s home is in the city of Ica, which is characterized as having a warm and friendly climate, and at the same time for its agricultural development, especially the cultivation of grapes, asparagus, paprika, and more.

Through a lot of effort and with savings she was able to start her toy business. Rosa gets up very early with a lot of enthusiasm to go to work where she works 8 hours assisting up to 10 customers a day. She thinks that it is going well because she is friendly to the customers and most of all because she offers appealing products at a good price.

Rosa is very grateful for the Kiva loans and thanks to the help they have provided she is able to buy merchandise for her business such as scooters for which she has some orders. This is the way she can have a better variety of products to offer her customers and continue fighting to reach her biggest dream of providing her son a good profession and  to continue struggling to become a great micro-entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy games for her toy business

loans.name: Emilia Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer de carácter muy jovial y sobre todo con mucha alegría a pesa de que ha pasado por muchas adversidades y a pesar de todo ello ha logrado salir adelante, sobre todo porque es madre y su hijo es el regalo más importante que Dios le ha podido dar y quien es su mayor motivación y su razón de vivir. La vivienda de Blanca se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de Carhuaz, la cual se encuentra en la sierra peruana, Carhuaz tiene un clima muy frio y es muy visitado por los turistas de diversas partes del mundo, ya que podemos encontrar al “Nevado de Pastoruri”.

Día a día Blanca trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa en el mercado de su ciudad, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y con el fruto de trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos del hogar; ella cree que esta saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque le gusta su trabajo y sobre todo porque es amable con los clientes.

Blanca está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá terminar de construir su vivienda ya que le faltan materiales de construcción para construir las paredes y parte del techo, de esta manera ella podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y Terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Blanca is a very enthusiastic and joyful person despite all the hardship that she's been through. Despite all this, she has managed to get ahead especially because she is a mother to her son who is the best present God could ever have given her and who is her motivation and reason for life. 

Blanca's house is found in the city of Carhuaz, which is found in the Peruvian highlands. Carhuaz is very cold and is visited by tourists from all over the world as there you can find the 'Pastoruri Glacier'. 

Day by day, Blanca works in her small clothes business in the city's market. She works for around 10 hours a day and with her profits she is able to pay her household costs, albeit with much effort. She believes that she is doing well because her enjoys her work and especially because she is kind with her clients.

Blanca is very thankful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their help she will be able to finish building her house as she still needs some building materials to build the walls and part of the ceiling. 

Through this, she will be able to improve her quality of life and continue working and fighting to make her dream come true: "Give her son a good education and finish building her house".

loans.use: to build her house

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Judith es una mujer de 62 años de edad, pero con una alegría y una vivacidad de una joven de 20 años, vive al lado de su esposo  con el cual tiene 3 hijos los cuales son mayores y por quienes ha luchado con mucha fuerza y dedicación para convertirlos en personas de bien. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Judith solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto grado de primaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar diseño de modas.

Con mucho esfuerzo, ahorro y el apoyo de su esposo logro iniciar su negocio de servicio de vulcanizado de motos y mototaxi, ella trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el día; ella cree que su negocio está saliendo adelante porque ofrece un buen servicio y sobre todo trata a los clientes con mucha amabilidad.

Judtih está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una compresora de segunda mano para su negocio, de esta manera ella podrá tener las herramientas necesarias para realizar su trabajo y así mejorar sus ingresos y poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una gran taller y poder seguir apoyando a mi familia”.
texts.en:
Judith is a 62 year old woman, but she has the joy and vivaciousness of a young 20 year old.  She lives with her husband and their three children.  The children are now adults, and she struggled with great effort and dedication for them to become good people.  Due to few financial resources, Judith was only able to go to school until the fourth grade.  However, she would have liked to have studied fashion design.

With great effort, savings, and her husband’s support, she managed to start a tire repair service for motorcycles and ‘mototaxis’ [a motorcycle adapted to provide transport service for passengers].  She works in her business around ten hours a day, and she can tend to 15 customers in a day.  She believes that her business is getting ahead because she provides good service, and, most of all, because she treats her customers so kindly.

Judith is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided she will be able to buy a second hand compressor for her business.  This way she will be able to have the tools needed to do her work.  This way she will improve her income and be able to make her biggest dream a reality:  “To have a large shop and be able to continue supporting my family.”

loans.use: to buy a compressor.

loans.name: Walter Paulino

texts.es:
Walter es un hombre muy trabajador, desde pequeño aprendió a trabajar ya que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos, es por ello que solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Mecánica. Es así que luego de mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su taller mecánico ya que siempre le ha gustado reparar carros y desde joven aprendió ha hacerlo; Walter le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 10 clientes diariamente; el cree que su negocio está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo es cuidadoso con su trabajo.

 Walter está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una compresora y de esta manera tener las herramientas necesaria para desempeñar su trabajo, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Walter’s a very hardworking man who learned to work when still small because his parents had few economic resources.  
Because of this he was only able to attend school up to fifth year of secondary school but he would have liked to have studied Mechanical Engineering.  This is how with much effort and saving he was able to open his own repair shop since he’s always enjoyed repairing cars and learned how to do so when he was young.  Walter works about ten hours daily and can see up to 10 customers per day.  He believes his business is turning out well because he’s very responsible and above all very careful with his work.

Walter is very grateful to Kiva lenders because of the support provided he will be able to buy a compressor and have the tools needed to do his work which will make it possible for him to improve his income and continue striving towards his greatest dream: to own a house.

loans.use: to buy a compressor.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, además de tener una gastronomía muy variada. Carlos está casado y junto a su esposa tienen 2 hijos quienes tienen 21 y 18 años y se encuentran estudiando en la universidad, para Carlos son lo mas importante que tiene en la vida y son el motor que necesita cada dia para poder seguir adelnate y poder brindarles una vida digna y llena de amor. Con mucho esfuerzo Carlos logro estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería de Construcción y gracias a ello logro encontrar empleo en una empresa de construcción, desempeñando las labores de operador de maquinaria pesada, su horarios de trabajo son muy variados, pero ese esfuerzo tiene su recompensa en la felicidad de sus hijos; el cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es responsable y sobre todo dedicado.

Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva podrá comprar cemento, arena, fierros, entre otros, lo que le permitirá poder terminar de construir su vivienda, asi el podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida para su familia ya que actualmente su vivienda es de adobe, de esta manera el seguirá luchando poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una educación y profesión a sus hijos y seguir sacando adelante a su familia”.
texts.en:
Carlos is a very hardworking man living in the city of Pucallpa which is noted for its hot, welcoming climate and for its very varied cuisine.  Carlos is married and he and his wife have two children who are 21 and 18 years of age and attending university.  For Carlos, they are the most important thing in his life and the motor that pushes him daily to continue forward in order to provide them with a life of dignity that’s full of love.  With much effort Carlos succeeded in studying the career of Construction Engineering and thanks to that was able to secure employment as a heavy machinery operator in a construction firm.  His work schedule varies but his efforts are rewarded with his children’s happiness.   He believes he’s doing well because he’s responsible and above all, dedicated.

Carlos is very grateful to Kiva lenders because he’ll be able to buy cement, sand and iron rods, among others, that will make it possible for him to finish building his house thus providing better quality of life for his family since his house is currently adobe.  In this way, he will continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to provide professional education for his children and continue moving his family forward.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies like cement, sand, iron rods, etc.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Aba sells beauty products in Kufur near Elmina. She has received no formal education. Aba is married and has ten children. Her husband is a steel binder. 

Aba has been selling beauty products for ten years. She is responsible for supporting her husband with her large family’s expenses. Her loan will be used to buy more beauty products, such as lotions, makeup and hair products, for sale. 

Aba hopes to use the new profits from her business to grow and diversify her business.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products such as lotions, makeup, and hair products for sale.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es:
Jose es un joven e 25 años de edad. La vivienda de Jose se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad en la cual podemos encontrar muchos atractivos turísticos entre los cuales tenemos la laguna de Huacachina, asimismo se cultivan los productos como la uva, esparrago, algodón, entre otros. Desde muy pequeño a Jose le encantaba mirar como pintaban los autos y motos en un taller que estaba muy cerca a su casa, por ello con el transcurso de los años aprendió como se realizaba este trabajo, por ello actualmente trabaja como ayudante en una taller de pintado automotriz de su ciudad. Jose trabaja en dicho taller alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar; el cree que esta saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y realiza su trabajo con honestidad.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una compresora para poder poco a poco iniciar su propio negocio de pintado automotriz, de esta manera tendrá la herramienta necesaria para realizar su trabajo y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y su propio negocio”.
texts.en:
Jose is a 25 year old man. Jose's house is located in the city of  Ica, a city with a lot of tourist attractions. Among them is Huacachina lake. They grow products such as grapes, asparagus, cotton and more. Since he was very young, Jose loved to see how cars and motorcycles were painted at a workshop that was close to his house. That is why over the years he learned how this job was done and now he works as an assistant at an auto painting workshop in town. Jose works in the workshop around 8 hours a day and with the money he earns he helps his parents with the household expenses. He thinks he is getting ahead at his job because he is very responsible and does his job honestly.     

Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy a compressor to be able to start his own auto painting business little by little. This way, he will have the tools he needs to do his job and fight to make his biggest dream come true: "having a house and his own business."

loans.use: to buy a compressor

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.es:
Hipolito es un nombre con una alegría contagiante, es muy bromista y es por ello que así logro conquista a su esposa, con la cual tienen 2 hijos de 3 y 8 años, a quienes ama muchísimo y por ello trabaja muy duro para poder brindarle una buena calidad de vida a pesar de las adversidades y sobre todo para que sean personas de bien. La vivienda de Hipolito se encuentra en la ciudad de Nazca, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido, posee muchos atractivos turísticos, entre los cuales podemos apreciar a las “Líneas de Nazca”. Hipolita es muy trabajador y como muchos peruanos al no encontrar empleo decidió empezar a trabaja como taxista, ya que para Hipolito cualquier trabajo es bueno con tal que sea honrado, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas al día y cuando hay festividades en su ciudad aprovecha para tener un dinero extra y trabaja en las madrugadas; el cree que esta saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo es amable con los clientes.

Hipolito está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su gran ayuda el podrá comprar una puerta de fierro y lunas para su vivienda ya que actualmente la puerta de su casa es de calamina y sus ventanas están cubiertas de plástico, de esta manera podrá brindarle mayor seguridad a  su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener un auto nuevo para su servicio de taxi”.
texts.en:
Hipolito is a man with a contagious joy. He has a good sense of humor, and this is how he captivated his wife. They have two children, 3 and 8 years old, who he loves very much and are the reason for working hard. He wants to provide them with a good quality of life despite any setback. Overall, he wants them to be persons of good character. Hipolito lives in Nazca, a city with a warm weather and many touristic attractions, such as the “Nazca Lines.”

Hipolito is a hardworking man, and as many Peruvians, he decided to start working as a taxi driver when he could not find a job. For him, any job is a good job, as long as it is a decent one. He works for ten hours every day and even more during holidays, to get an extra income. He believes that he will get ahead in life with his job, because he is responsible and kind to his clients.

Hipolito appreciates the big help that Kiva lenders give him. With it, he will be able to buy a metal door and glass for the windows of his house. Today, the door is made of corrugated iron and the windows are covered with plastic. With this improvement, he will be able to provide his family with a safer environment and improve their quality of life. This will make it possible for him to continue fighting to make his biggest dream come true: “To give his children a good education and to have a new car for his taxi business.”

loans.use: to buy a door and glass for the windows.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja la cual la apoya mucho en todo lo que ella hace y asimismo trabaja vendiendo pan, realiza trabajos de plomería, electricidad y albañilería, es un mil oficios como decimos acá en Perú, junto a ella también viven  sus preciosos hijos de 7 y 1 año de edad a los cuales ama mucho y son el mejor regalo que Dios le ha podido dar a una mujer y por los cuales daría la vida con verlos felices. Su vivienda se ubica en el distrito de Santiago, Ica Perú. El Distrito de Santiago se caracteriza por albergar varias empresas agroexportadoras, las cuales brindan muchos empleos en la zona y sobre todo porque este distrito se caracteriza también por su actividad agrícola, en especial el cultivo de espárragos, uva y algodón.  En su tiempo libre Rosa disfruta de pasear con sus hijos o tan solo conversar o jugar con ello, asimismo le gusta cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos “Cara pulcra con Sopa Seca”.
 
Cada día Rosa se levanta muy temprano para iniciar su negocio de venta de Refrescos y raspadillas en temporada de verano porque en invierno vende desayunos; ella le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 6 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende con cariño a sus clientes y por ello siempre regresan a su negocio.

Rosa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran ayuda y gracias a ello podrá comprar utensilios para su negocio como vasos descartables, sorbetes al por mayor, entre otros para poder darles más comodidad a sus clientes, así seguir trabajando y luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”, ya que actualmente vive en casa de los padres de su pareja.
texts.en:
Rosa is 30 years old and lives together with her partner who supports her very much in everything that she does.  Her partner works selling bread, as well as doing jobs in plumbing, electrical, and brick work.  He has a thousand jobs as we say in Perú.  Together Rosa lives with her partner and her precious children, ages 7 and 1, who she loves very much and who are the best gift that God could have given a woman.  For them she would give her life, to see them happy.  Her home is located in the district of Santiago, Ica Perú.  The district of Santiago is known for its agricultural activity, particularly the farming of asparagus, grapes and cotton.  In her free time Rosa enjoys strolls with her children or even just chatting or playing with them.  She also likes to cook one of her favorite dishes, "Cara pulcra con Sopa Seca" a popular Peruvian pork and potato dish.
 
Every day Rosa gets up very early to sell soft drinks and ices in the summer, and in the winter she sells breakfasts.  She works around 6 hours each day.  She believes that things are going well in her business because she provides her customers with care and for that reason they always come back to her business.

Rosa is very thankful for the Kiva lenders since this is the second time that they have offered her their great help.  Thanks to this assistance she will be able to buy utensils for her business like disposable cups, ices in bulk, an other items in order to give her customers more convenience. She will continue working and struggling each day in order to make her great dream a reality: "To have her own home," since she currently lives in her parents home along with her partner.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business (cups, flavored ices, and other items).
